original: Strike down any who would oppose our bailiff.
translation: 打倒任何胆敢反对我们的官员的人。

original: We must learn to live and let live.
translation: 我们必须学会和平共处。

original: Attempt to combine the best aspects of both schools.
translation: 尝试采撷众长。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] favors offense.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]更喜欢进攻。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] favors defense.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]更喜欢防御。

original: Attempt to lessen the impact.
translation: 尝试减轻其影响。

original: Give the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] free reins to reform the economy.
translation: 给予[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]充分的自由来改革经济。

original: Those poor people...
translation: 那些可怜人……

original: We must be willing to learn even from our lessers.
translation: 我们必须虚心求教，甚至向贫贱者学习。

original: Everyone must focus on the sea.
translation: 每个人都必须关注海洋。

original: The gifted group closest to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will be most fit to rule.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]身边才华横溢的近侍们最适合接过统治权。

original: We will just have to tolerate it.
translation: 我们将只能忍着。

original: Let's keep calm and ensure no damage is done.
translation: 我们要保持冷静，确保不要造成损失。

original: Ruthless? Me?
translation: 无情？是说我吗？

original: Attempt to convince them that this is not true.
translation: 尝试去说服他们这不是真的。

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will oversee this project personally.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]将亲自监督这项工程。

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will oversee this project personally.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]将亲自监督这项工程。

original: We cannot allow anyone to stand in the way of progress.
translation: 我们不能允许任何人阻挡我们的进步。

original: Convince them in the need for our policies.
translation: 使他们明白我们的政策的重要性。

original: Offer the leaders something to drop their demands.
translation: 贿赂领导者让他们放弃要求。

original: Threaten to expose their secrets unless they back down.
translation: 威胁曝光他们的秘密，除非他们退让。

original: A life in the army will harden them again!
translation: 军旅生活将会使他们再次坚毅起来！

original: I know just who should receive our patronage.
translation: 我知道应该把这钱赞助给谁。

original: I know just who should receive our patronage.
translation: 我知道应该把这钱赞助给谁。

original: This will be an excellent opportunity, for him.
translation: 这对他来说是一个绝好的机会。

original: We'll just have to ensure he's always out of the loop.
translation: 我们只需要把他排除到核心圈子之外就好。

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] knows ways to close off some of the worst ways to exploit the system.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]知道如何封锁那些钻体制空子的糟糕手段。

original: As long as they don't hurt our interests directly...
translation: 只要他们不要直接伤及我们的利益...

original: It's great for spreading the many ideas of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] too.
translation: 能够传播我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的一些思想也是极好的。

original: We need more men of quality, not just more men.
translation: 我们需要更多优质的人，仅仅是更多的人可不行。

original: Let our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] go on a recruitment campaign.
translation: 让我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]参与征兵活动。

original: We will just have to be a bit more careful and still delegate some power.
translation: 我们只需要更小心一些，继续把一些权力委任出去就好。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] may be able to convince some of them to stay.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]也许能说服其中一些人留下来。

original: Attempt to create more career opportunities.
translation: 尝试创造更多升职机会。

original: Make it known to all who will listen.
translation: 让所有人都知道这件事。

original: Preposterous!
translation: 简直荒谬！

original: Due to the personal popularity of our monarch we can simply ignore those vile rumors.
translation: 由于我们君主良好的个人声誉，我们完全可以无视那些恶毒的谣言。

original: We must do better than that!
translation: 我们必须比这做得更好！

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] must be allowed to strengthen the government!
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]必须要强化政府！

original: Imagine what our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] could do with more resources...
translation: 想象一下，如果拥有更多资源，我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]能做到什么...

original: Use this to lure promising artists to our court.
translation: 用这个来招揽有前途的艺术家到我们宫廷里来。

original: They just need to be whipped into shape.
translation: 他们只需要被塑造成才。

original: Silver, not silk!
translation: 巧舌如簧，可不是乱晃！

original: Get back in line!
translation: 滚回前线去！

original: That's the spirit!
translation: 就是这种精神！

original: An excellent opportunity!
translation: 一个绝好的机会！

original: We need both!
translation: 我全都要！

original: Let's go on the diplomatic offensive in general now!
translation: 现在我们要继续进行全面外交攻势！

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is practically a saint.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]几乎是一个圣人了。

original: A few? You'll get as many as possible.
translation: 更多？你们将得到尽可能多的东西！

original: This is now our top priority!
translation: 这是我们当前的首要任务！

original: Convince him that life in [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName] would be in his best interest.
translation: 让他相信，在[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]的生活对他最有利。

original: Help them find a more suitable captain for the endeavor.
translation: 帮助他们找到一个更合适的船长来完成此事。

original: We must commit fully to the Renaissance.
translation: 我们必须全身心致力于文艺复兴。

original: Curtail his influence through legislation.
translation: 通过立法削弱他的影响力。

original: Negotiate with the Noble.
translation: 与贵族协商。

original: Intimidate the Noble.
translation: 威胁贵族。

original: I know a good opportunity when I see one.
translation: 我一看就知道这是一个好机会。

original: I'm sure I know some more people who can contribute.
translation: 我确信我知道更多能出力的人。

original: I know just where to put those funds...
translation: 我正好知道该把这些资金放到哪里...

original: We must donate this to the poor.
translation: 我们必须将这个捐给穷人。

original: Luckily we are surrounded by people we can trust.
translation: 幸运的是我们周围的人都是可以信任的。

original: Let us extend his responsibilities!
translation: 扩大他的职责！

original: Don't Panic!
translation: 不要恐慌！

original: Is anyone really surprised?
translation: 真的有人感到惊讶么？

original: Attempt to lessen the impact.
translation: 试图减轻其影响。

original: We must divert state resources to counteract this dark trend.
translation: 我们必须划拨出国家资源来阻止这糟糕的趋势。

original: We can take advantage of their ignorance!
translation: 我们可以利用他们的无知！

original: This way we can keep our subjects in the dark...
translation: 这样我们就可以瞒过我们的属国...

original: Invest the money in promising new projects.
translation: 将钱投资给有前途的新项目。

original: Let us divert as much as possible to our central treasury.
translation: 我们要把尽可能多的钱财转移到中央金库。

original: Let us make the most of this, it's a fantastic new world!
translation: 我们要充分利用这一点，这是个美妙的新世界！

original: The state should help them negotiate better terms.
translation: 国家应该帮助他们协商更好的条款。

original: We can support them by investing in better ships.
translation: 我们可以投入更好的船只来支援他们。

original: Fascinating!
translation: 太美妙了！

original: Nothing is really beyond my control!
translation: 没有什么能真的不受我们的控制！

original: We are a diplomatic superpower!
translation: 我们在外交上举足轻重！

original: We have the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to thank for this.
translation: 这事可多亏了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。

original: Let's go with a more ambitious program of improvements.
translation: 我们要进行一项更具有雄心的改良项目。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] will make good use of this opportunity.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]将会好好利用这个机会。

original: Root out the corruption in our government.
translation: 根除我们政府中的腐败因子。

original: Improve the officer training curriculum.
translation: 改良军官训练课程。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] wishes to hold an opulent feast...
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]想要举行一场盛大的宴会...

original: Allow the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to personally oversee the diverting of funds.
translation: 允许[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]亲自监督资金的划拨转移。

original: This is a perfect time for one of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s little projects.
translation: 这对我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的一个小小项目来说简直是完美的时机。

original: The kind nature of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] and wicked councilors are to blame.
translation: 这只能归责于我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的善良天性和卑劣的廷臣们。

original: Let our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] attempt to placate them.
translation: 让我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]尝试去安抚他们。

original: Let our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] personally take the blame.
translation: 由我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]本人承担指责。

original: Crush these troublemakers!
translation: 踩死这些闹事的！

original: Encourage them to go into other businesses.
translation: 鼓励他们投身其他事业。

original: Complaints indicate a lack of devotion to their work.
translation: 抱怨表明他们对工作不够投入。

original: Let the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] oversee a trade reform.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来监督贸易改革。

original: Let the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] attempt to soften the impact.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]尝试去减轻影响。

original: Allow our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to see if there is a solution to the benefit of everyone.
translation: 允许我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来探索一个惠及所有人的解决方案。

original: Allow our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] to deal with any visible signs of corruption.
translation: 允许我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来处理任何有关腐败的明显征兆。

original: Let our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] replace certain high-ranking officials.
translation: 让我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]换掉某个高阶官员。

original: Let our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] personally handle this.
translation: 让我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]亲自处理此事。

original: Let our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] speak on our behalf.
translation: 让我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]替我们说几句。

original: We must spread the benefits to a wider area.
translation: 我们必须将福祉传播到更广大的地区。

original: Increase Production and Tax.
translation: 增加生产和税收。

original: Increase Production and Manpower.
translation: 增加生产和人力。

original: Increase Tax and Manpower.
translation: 增加税收和人力。

original: Crush them!
translation: 粉碎他们！

original: Let the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] explain why they never had those rights to begin with.
translation: 由[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]来解释为什么说他们从来就没有这些权利。

original: Offer them partnership in a state venture.
translation: 由国家来投资他们以提供帮助。

original: We must find a way to exploit this.
translation: 我们必须找到一个方法来加以利用。

original: Let [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] Intimidate them.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]胁迫他们。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] can intimidate them into keeping their peace.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]可以逼迫他们和平共处。

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] must solve the conflict.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]必须解决此类冲突。

original: We have been undercharging them.
translation: 我们一直少收了他们的钱。

original: We must get better at hiding our tracks.
translation: 我们必须做得更隐秘些。

original: Let the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] negotiate a better deal.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]商谈一个更好的条件。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] shall make a new list of rights.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]应列出一系列新的特权。

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will handle it.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]将会处理此事。

original: Attempt to open up new opportunities without upsetting old elites.
translation: 尝试在不惹怒旧权贵的前提下提供一些新的机会。

original: Renegotiate the price.
translation: 重议价款。

original: It must be even grander!
translation: 我们还要修得更宏伟！

original: Let [Root.Monarch.GetName] oversee the project personally.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetName]来亲自监督这个项目。

original: He's got some interesting ideas actually!
translation: 他确实有些一些有趣的想法！

original: Use this opportunity to reconciliate with our neighbors.
translation: 利用这个机会与我们的邻国和解。

original: Use this opportunity to further tax foreign traders.
translation: 利用这个机会进一步对外国贸易商征税。

original: Attempt to mediate.
translation: 尝试调停。

original: As long as the state gets a slice of the pie.
translation: 只要国家也能分一杯羹就好。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will personally crack down on these sinners.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]将亲自制裁这些罪人。

original: Promote the Navy.
translation: 壮大海军。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] expects better of you!
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]期待你做得更好！

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will know how to get the most for our money.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]知道如何更好地利用我们的钱。

original: Everyone who is anyone will have to be there.
translation: 所有人都必须在那儿。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] wishes to combine this with an opulent feast.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]希望再增加一场盛大的宴会。

original: The personal agents of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will handle this.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]会派出私下的人手来处理此事。

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] will take care of this.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]会照看此事。

original: Fascinating Stuff!
translation: 令人陶醉！

original: Courage is what wins battles, not weapons.
translation: 赢得战斗的是勇气，不是武器。

original: Excellent Diplomacy
translation: 出色的外交

original: We are enjoying the fruits of an excellent diplomatic reputation.
translation: 我们将享受卓越的外交声誉所带来的回报。

original: Ruler Invited to Opulent Feast
translation: 统治者受邀参加盛大的宴会

original: Highly Eased Tensions
translation: 大幅缓和的局势

original: The many Interests of [Root.Monarch.GetName]
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]的各种兴趣

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has grown increasingly interested with the higher intellectual pursuits and can spend days talking to the learned men of our court. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] has started inviting scholars from near and far to help [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] better understand how the world and the people in it functions.\nThe way things are developing [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] could probably become an authority in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] own right if [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] could spend enough time and resources on the areas of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] choice.
translation: 我们君主[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]对更高的知识追求愈发感兴趣，常常会与我们宫廷的知识分子攀谈数日。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]业已开始广纳天下学者来协助[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]更深入的了解世界和人民的运转之道。\n如果[Root.Monarch.GetName]能够在[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]所感兴趣的领域投入足够的时间和精力的话， [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]或许也能在此领域形成[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]权威。

original: We must strive to understand the physical world around us.
translation: 我们必须全力了解我们身边的物质世界。

original: Our ruler will be free to spend time and the resources of our state in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] pursuit of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] great interests in life.\nOnly time will tell if [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] will make a name for [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] in a scholarly discipline.
translation: 我们的统治者将不受约束地把我们国家政府的时间和精力投入到[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]远大追求上去。\n只有时间能够告诉我们[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]是否能够为[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]赢得学术认可。

original: A ruler must understand the laws of god and men.
translation: 作为领袖，定要了解神和人的律法。

original: Let us not waste [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] time and money with such matters.
translation: 我们还是不要在这些事情上浪费[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]时间和金钱吧。

original: Advances in Cartography
translation: 制图术上的进步

original: A devoted student of the world around [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has come to be obsessed with maps. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] palace in [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName] has rooms entirely devoted to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] map collection and our dear [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is spending quite some time staring at them and cataloguing them.\nWhile this has made [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] a bit odd in the eyes of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] courtiers (and the royal treasurer) our country is benefiting from the great archive [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has built up about the world around us.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]向来是一个对[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]身边的世界十分感兴趣的学生。而今，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]对地图更是痴迷。[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]在[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]的宫殿已有许多的房间成为了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]地图收藏室，并且，我们亲爱的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]总是会花上许多时间去观摩记录分类它们。\n虽说这样的行为让[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]延臣有些诧异，但是我们的国家的确从[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]所建立的描述我们身边世界的档案中获益匪浅。

original: The world is such a big place.
translation: 这天下真是广袤无比。

original: Advances in Gunsmithing
translation: 造枪术上的进步

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has taken a great interest in the function and form of guns. Considerable effort has been spent tracking down unusual or innovative firearms and [Root.Monarch.GetName] will gleefully disassemble and rebuild any weapon brought to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim].\nSome would consider this fascination morbid (not to mention expensive) but as the result of this long standing project our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has created what [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] claims is the perfect firearm.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]对各种火器的形状和机械原理很感兴趣。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]花了不少功夫去寻找天下的奇门枪械，然后愉快地将它们拆卸组装。\n可能有些人会觉得[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim这种对枪械的痴迷多少有些病态，但是我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的确在他的研究中制造出了[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]自称最完美的枪械。

original: Let the world tremble!
translation: 让这个世界为之震撼吧！

original: Gun designer
translation: 枪械设计师

original: Our troops are equipped with an unusual type of firearm designed by our ruler.
translation: 我们的部队装备了一种由我们统治者所设计的奇门火器。

original: The Pursuit of Gold
translation: 对金子的追求

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been absorbed by the possibility of creating gold ever since [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] early childhood and with the government coffers open to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] this has grown into an obsession. Every book and supposed expert has been gathered to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] to be examined or questioned. [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] has spent many days in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] laboratory but has so far not come close to creating this expensive metal.\nSome would call this pursuit a fool's errand but it has certainly improved our knowledge about Chemistry.
translation: 自小以来[Root.Monarch.GetName]就沉浸于各种能制造出金子的可能中，当[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]开始掌握财政大权时，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]这种梦想更是变成了一种狂热。于是每一本与炼金术相关的书，每一个相关的学者，都被传召到了[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]来接受检查和询问。[Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]实验室已经花上数日，但是还远远造不出这种金属来。\n不少人会说这是蠢货才会有的偏执追求，但是这的确也让我们对化学的了解有所增长。

original: Excellent, let's try to tone this down now.
translation: 太棒了，让我们试试看这种缓和剂吧。

original: Must... Create Gold...
translation: 一定要……把金子炼出来……

original: Give our monarch free reins to pursue [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] goals in alchemy. Chances of success are very uncertain.
translation: 让我们的君主自由地去追求[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]在炼金术上的理想。我们并不能保证成功的可能。

original: Pursuit of a Hobby
translation: 对兴趣的追求

original: While [Root.Monarch.GetName] has taken a great interest in all kinds of intellectual pursuits throughout [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] reign it seems [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] ambition to make a name for [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] among the scholars of the world hasn't been very successful. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] patronage of greater intellects is not without merit for [Root.GetName] as a whole even if [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] failed ambition remains a sore point to the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]统治时期里，[Root.Monarch.GetName]对各种知识的追求并没有使得[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]野心获得满足：让[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]扬名于学界中。即使对于[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]本人来说，梦想落空实在是让自己有些不爽，但[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]对比[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]更伟大的学者的赞助依然对[Root.GetName]有益。

original: 'Dicebat nos esse quasi nanos, gigantium humeris insidentes.'
translation: “那就把我们比作站在巨人肩膀上的矮人。”

original: I will surround myself with the great minds of our age!
translation: 我要去广结这个时代的大学者！

original: Codification of Laws
translation: 法规汇编

original: After intense study and debate [Root.Monarch.GetName] [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] of [Root.GetName] has decreed that a number of local laws and legal traditions from all over [Root.GetName] will be replaced by a new collection of laws of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] making.\nThis compilation of law combines the jurisprudence from all over our realm as well as other countries of our religion and is believed it will act as an example to judges for generations to come.
translation: 在经过激烈的研究讨论后，[Root.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]昭告天下，在[Root.GetName]全国境内，所有的传统法和本地法都会被[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]编纂的新法典集所替代。\n这些新法典结合了全国境内的法学理论，也包括了和我们有着相同信仰的其他国家已有的成果。我们相信这些新法典将会成为我们以后数代人的法律依据与基础。

original: Everyone has the right to a fair trial.
translation: 每个人都有权在法庭上获得公平的判决。

original: I can get used to this...
translation: 我想把它变成我的习惯……

original: The Great Debate of [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]
translation: [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]大辩论

original: In order to fully understand what rules govern a land and its inhabitants [Root.Monarch.GetName] has immersed [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] in the great works of theology and philosophy. A great number of scholars have also been brought to [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] to give their view on the order of things in the world.\nThis pursuit of guidance has now culminated in a great debate hosted by our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] in [Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 为了真正弄明白统治土地和人民的规律，[Root.Monarch.GetName]将[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]投入到研究神学与哲学著作中去已有段时日了。同时也有许多的学者被传唤来[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]，让他们来分享自己对世界运转规律的观点。\n现在，人们对世界规律的探寻将在一场由我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]在[Root.Owner.Capital.GetCapitalName]主持的大辩论中得出结果。

original: What a great day for learning!
translation: 这一天真能学到不少东西！

original: We must look further for answers.
translation: 我们必须挖掘出更多的答案。

original: What is Right in War and Peace
translation: 战争与和平中的权利

original: In [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] pursuit of justice [Root.Monarch.GetName] has come to interest [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] in the relations between great states. The conduct of states while at war, at sea or otherwise far from home is governed by few laws but many traditions. Determined to shape the international debate on these matters [Root.Monarch.GetName] has drawn from all material [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has been able to find to write a book on the laws of war, peace and international conduct. It is still not clear if this will make the difference our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] hopes it will but it has clearly made a difference to the standing of our country among other states.
translation: 在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]追求公正的生涯中，[Root.Monarch.GetName]也开始对大国之间的关系产生兴趣。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]发现国家与国家之间的协议实行，无论是在战争中，在海上，抑或是在其他外国事务，都主要以各种传统为依据，而缺少法律条文约束。[Root.Monarch.GetName]下定决心要对此情况进行国际讨论，便开始搜集[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]所能找到的所有材料来作成一本书，它将讨论战争、和平及国际事务的执行法规。我们仍不清楚这是否能够达成我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]所想要的结果，但是它的的确确对我们国家在国际上的地位产生了影响。

original: A Valid Casus Belli?
translation: 比如一个可用的宣战理由？

original: A Potion of Mana?
translation: 魔力药剂？

original: The secret to creating gold out of some lesser material has continued to elude [Root.Monarch.GetName] but in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] experiments [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has managed to create something [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] refers to as a 'Mana Potion'. Our [Root.Monarch.GetName] insists that drinking this potion will bring [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] life and vitality, not to mention the power to do great things for our realm.
translation: 从次等的材料中制造出金子的方法对[Root.Monarch.GetName]仍是一个遥不可及的秘密。但在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]一次实验中，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]却成功的制备出一种被[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]称之为“魔力药水”的东西。[Root.Monarch.GetName]坚称这瓶药水能够给[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]带来寿命和活力，如此[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]便有更多的精力为我们的国家做出更多伟大的贡献。

original: Drink the Mana Potion
translation: 饮下魔药。

original: Provincial Feud
translation: 省份冲突

original: What started as a dispute of minor concern between a local strongman and some of his tenants has somehow grown into a dispute of national importance. With priests, scholars, nobles and street demagogues all sharing their opinions as loudly as possible the parties of the feud have finally turned to [Root.Monarch.GetName] to have their conflict solved.\nHaving heard them plead their cases our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is convinced that the tenants, however, deplorable their situation, are the ones at fault. A just and well argued verdict is unlikely to upset anyone but it is quite tempting to use public opinion to increase our own authority over the province at this strongman's expense.
translation: 最近一件事情的发展席卷了全国，而它一开始只是一个本地豪强和他佃户的纠纷。教士，学者，贵族，甚至普通人茶余饭后都会大声分享自己的对此事的观点。纠纷的双方最终还是把此事寄希望于[Root.Monarch.GetName]处理。\n在弄清楚事情的来龙去脉之后，我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]认为，不管这些佃户的处境是多么的糟糕，此事依然是他们的过错。虽然一个公平合理的判决大抵不会引起人们的不满，但是我们倒是可以借此机会利用这位豪强来增加我们在那个省份的权威。

original: Try to settle the issue justly.
translation: 让我们公平公正的处理这件事。

original: We must exploit this situation!
translation: 我们得好好利用此事！

original: Every owned province in this §YArea§! will get a §G-0.05§! autonomy reduction for 30 years and every province not at its minimum an immediate reduction of §G15§! local autonomy.
translation: 我们每一个在§Y此地区§!的省份都会获得一个持续30年的§G-0.05§!每月自治度减成，如果当前有此地省份自治度不是其最小值的话，它将立即获得一个§G15§!的地方自治度减成。

original: Increasing Local Authority
translation: 上升的地方权威

original: We are rapidly expanding our authority over this area after having crushed local powerholders, stealing their clients.
translation: 在我们粉碎当地豪强并夺走他们的关系网后，我们正不断地扩大我们在当地的权威。

original: Settled Conflict
translation: 冲突被处理

original: We have justly settled a local conflict in one of the states of our country, impressing high and low in our country.
translation: 我们公正地处理了国内一起本地纠纷，此事让我们赢得了高低贵贱者的共同赞许。

original: A Righteous [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: 正义的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]

original: There are few monarchs who can boast such a fervent supporter base as [Root.Monarch.GetName]. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] deputies are not always as fortunate however, in some cases our subjects simply refuse to accept that a particular governor, tax collector or other government official is acting on [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s behalf. A petition has reached us about one such governor. According to popular belief he has been abusing our good will while making the people suffer.
translation: 没有几个君主能够像[Root.Monarch.GetName]自豪的吹嘘自己众多热情的支持者。然而[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]的一些手下却没有受到这么好的待遇，我们有些臣民拒绝接受以[Root.Monarch.GetName]名义行事的执政官，税务官或是其他政府官员。我们已经收到了一份关于这样的一份请愿书：根据民意，一位执政官正在滥用我们的名义鱼肉百姓，让人民遭罪。

original: Chastise the Governor.
translation: 惩罚这位执政官。

original: This §YArea§! will get a §G-2§! unrest reduction and a §R25%§! tax reduction for 30 years.
translation: 在接下来的30年内，每一个§Y此地区§!的省份都会减少§G-2§!点每月叛乱风险，以及§R25%§!的税收减成。

original: Attempt to defend the governor.
translation: 尝试为那位执政官辩护。

original: This §YArea§! will get a §R1§! unrest increase and a §G25%§! tax increase for 30 years.
translation: 在接下来的30年内，每一个§Y此地区§!的省份都会增加§R1§!点每月叛乱风险，以及§G25%§!的税收加成。

original: Leave it to the locals to handle.
translation: 让这件事留给当地人解决。

original: Chastised Local Governor
translation: 被严惩的执政官

original: After a petition from our subjects in this area we have chastised the local governor, destroying his authority to collect taxes efficiently but ensuring our own popularity as a ruler of this area.
translation: 我们顺从这个地区臣民的请愿严惩了当地的执政官，他的失势导致他不能有效收税，但是我们统治者却能够保证在这个地方依然受到欢迎。

original: Strengthened Local Governor
translation: 得势的执政官

original: The local governor here is quite unpopular but we have used our full Royal Authority to support him. Enabling a greater trickle of money to reach our coffers.
translation: 此地的执政官不受人民欢迎，我们君室权威全权支持他。更多的钱将能够流入到我们的国库。

original: The Virtues of a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的美德

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s rule is marked by remarkable cooperation, from the bureaucrats to the simple traders and even the republican aristocracy, everyone seems to feel that our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has their good at heart. There is one group, however, that feel that [Root.Monarch.GetName] has let them down. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] own family and supporters feel we have not made enough use of our office. Their property and influence is substantial even if it has not grown much during [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] time in office and many insist that they could do great things for the republic.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]利用非凡多方合作统治国家，不论是官僚还是普通贸易者，甚至是共和国贵族都认为我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]与他们有着很好的关系。然而有一伙人却觉得[Root.Monarch.GetName]让他们失望了：[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]的家人和支持者认为我们还有空缺的职位……这些人的资产和影响力在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]任职的时候并不见增长，但是依然不可小觑，这些人坚称他们可以为我们的共和国做出许多大事。

original: We must fight all forms of Nepotism!
translation: 我们必须反对任何形式的任人唯亲！

original: I'm sure our own flesh and blood can be trusted.
translation: 我很确信我的血亲是可以信任的。

original: Continue to dodge [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s relatives.
translation: 躲避[Root.Monarch.GetName]的亲戚。

original: True Republican Virtues
translation: 真正的共和国美德

original: By spurning all requests to empower our own supporters we have strengthened our republican institutions against the dark influence of corruption.
translation: 我们拒绝任何能够扩大我们支持者力量的请求，从而强化了我们共和国的制度，避免了腐败的不良影响。

original: The Trusting Nature of [Root.Monarch.GetName]
translation: 天生轻信的[Root.Monarch.GetName]

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is famously tolerant of the non-[Root.Religion.GetName] communities in our realm. Some would even say [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is too trusting and allow these non-believers to cloud [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] judgment. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] close confidant $TREASURER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$ has in particular attracted much jealousy and ill-will. Rumors have started circulating that our dear advisor and $TREASURER_POSS_PRONOUN$$PHILOSOPHER_POSS_PRONOUN$$ARTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$$THEOLOGIAN_POSS_PRONOUN$$MASTER_OF_MINT_POSS_PRONOUN$$INQUISITOR_POSS_PRONOUN$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$ family has infiltrated the government in order to plot against the faithful.
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]对国内非[Root.Religion.GetName]群体十分宽容，有的人甚至说[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]太过轻信这些无信仰者，直接影响[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]判断力。[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]的挚友$TREASURER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$受到了人们的恶意中伤和嫉妒，有谣言称$TREASURER_POSS_PRONOUN$$PHILOSOPHER_POSS_PRONOUN$$ARTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$$THEOLOGIAN_POSS_PRONOUN$$MASTER_OF_MINT_POSS_PRONOUN$$INQUISITOR_POSS_PRONOUN$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST_POSS_PRONOUN$的家人已经渗透到政府来来发动他们针对虔诚者的阴谋。

original: Nonsense!
translation: 无稽之谈！

original: Conservative Backlash
translation: 保守派不满

original: Our policy of employing non-state religion subjects in high positions has angered the faithful in our country. They claim we are letting untrustworthy individuals into our midst and that soon they will betray us to their brothers in faith.
translation: 我们在政府要职中雇佣异教徒的政策激怒了国内的宗教团体。他们称这些政府中的异教徒不值得信任，很快他们就会为了他们自己的信仰而背叛我们

original: How could I have been so blind!?
translation: 我怎么会这么盲目？！

original: Hypocritical Ruler
translation: 虚伪的统治者

original: Our Ruler professes to be tolerant to all foreign faiths, but actions speak louder than words and our subjects have long memories.
translation: 我们的统治者自称对所有外来信仰持宽容态度，但事实胜于雄辩，我们会拭目以待。

original: Due to going against the character of [Root.Monarch.GetName] his tolerance bonuses will be nullified by the following modifier:
translation: 因为违反了[Root.Monarch.GetName] 的性格，他的宗教宽容加成会无效化，由于以下修正：

original: Ravages of War
translation: 战争破坏

original: War is a terrible thing and even many years after peace has been concluded new subjects will long for the relative tranquility prior to the arrival of enemy troops. In particularly badly affected by the ravages of war little may be left of prior government institutions or even family extended families. In such areas demagogues can quickly whip up separatism and discord, hampering their integration into the wider state.
translation: 战争是一件可怕的事情，即使在和平条约结束多年后，新的臣民也会渴望在敌军到来之前保持相对的平静。受战争破坏影响特别严重的地区，以前的个人，家庭，甚至政府机构都很难保留下来。在这些地区，煽动者能迅速煽动分离主义和挑起叛乱，阻碍了该地区融入我们国家。

original: We must help these poor people rebuild their lives!
translation: 我们必须帮助这些可怜人来重建他们的家园！

original: Every owned province in this §YArea§! will get a §G-5§! unrest reduction as well as §R-15%§! tax income reduction for 15 years.
translation: 每个在 §YArea§!拥有的省份，在15年内，都会获得§G-5§! 减少动荡和 §R-15%§! 减少税收的效果。

original: Healing the Ravages of War
translation: 从战争破坏中回复

original: Through tax breaks and an active policy of rebuilding we have attempted to restore order and peace to this war torn area.
translation: 通过减税和积极的重建政策，我们已试图恢复这个战乱地区的秩序与和平。

original: Let us instead use the devastation to our advantage!
translation: 相反，让我们化悲痛为力量！

original: Every owned province in this §YArea§! will get a §G-2§! local autonomy reduction for 15 years as well as an immediate reduction of autonomy of up to §G25§!.
translation: 每个在 §YArea§!地区拥有的省份都会获得持续15年 §G-2§!地方自治减少的效果，并且自治度会立马降低到 §G25§!。

original: Local authorities are handling it.
translation: 地方当局正在处理

original: Rapid Repression Campaign
translation: 猛烈镇压叛乱

original: Rather than let the local society recover we are violently repressing all forms of separatism in this area.
translation: 与其让当地政府自然恢复，我们选择直接用武力手段猛烈地镇压这个地区的一切形式的分离主义。

original: Heresiarch?
translation: 异端首领？

original: A strange man has been spotted in the countryside at various locations around our realm. He is teaching a most unorthodox version of the creation of the world to whoever will listen to his jovial ramblings. According to some he represents a dangerous and vile reintepretation of holy scriptures but few of our subjects seem to have been taken in by the heresy. Rather many seem fond of this would-be prophet and his ideas.\nIntrigued by the reputation of [Root.Monarch.GetName] as a free thinking [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] the prophet is now demanding an audience with [Root.Monarch.GetName], offering to act as an advisor in spiritual matters.
translation: 一个奇怪的人经常在我国周边地区被人看到。他到处传向每个愿意听他鬼扯的人传播他那非主流的造物论。其学说中对圣经危险而邪恶的解读，诱惑吸引了一部分的人。很多人也对她的预言和思想很感兴趣。\n被[Root.Monarch.GetName]人称自由思想者 [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]的名声激起了兴趣，那个预言家希望和[Root.Monarch.GetName]面对面交流，并提出当任精神导师。

original: The world as a Cheese with worms? Fascinating perspective!
translation: 世界就像一块有虫子的奶酪？有趣的看法！

original: As a free thinker your ruler may have much to gain from conversing with this man, or his ideas may in fact be of little value. Public opinion will be harsh.
translation: 作为一个自由思想者，你的统治者可能会从与这个人的交谈中获得很多好处，当然也有可能他的想法实际上可能没有什么价值。舆论会很严厉。

original: We cannot allow him to make a mockery of our faith!
translation: 我们不能允许他嘲笑我们的信仰！

original: Harshly condemning this man in strong revulsion will surely impress the religious establishment but our ruler might lose his thirst for new ideas and fresh thoughts if [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] starts to quell them.
translation: 严词谴责这个人和给国内宗教阶级带来良好印象，但我们的统治者也可能由此失去对新事物和新思想的渴望，如果 [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]镇压他们。

original: Just show the man away.
translation: 把那人带走

original: Innovative Court
translation: 创新法院

original: Our ruler is filling our court with innovative, if a bit eccentric characters to help further the fortunes of our country.
translation: 我们的统治者正在用他的新思想改造我们的法院，真是有点古怪特质。

original: The Dynamic Cabinet of [Root.Monarch.GetName]
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]的动态内阁

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has made it [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] business to know all men and women of quality in our day and age. This has allowed [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] to gather a cabinet of the brightest minds of [Root.GetName]. Realizing what a great way this can be to further a career a close friend of [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s has approached us asking that we make room for one of his protégés in our inner circle. What reply can we offer his young talent?
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]把了解当下高素质的男女作为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]的职责。这使[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]得以组建一个由[Root.GetName]国内最聪明的人组成的内阁。[Root.Monarch.GetName]的一位挚友发现这制度对个人发展有巨大好处，就前来我们的权力核心圈子寻求他的一席之地。我们该给年轻有才华的他怎样的答复呢？

original: You have a remarkable brain, and I should like to plunder it.
translation: 你有非凡的智慧，而我正需要它。

original: I'm sure we can make room for you somewhere in our administration...
translation: 我很确定我能在政府机构中给你找个位子……

original: Leading by Example
translation: 以身作则

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] is not a [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] to easily lose [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] composure. In times of upheaval, strife or conflict [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has always stood firmly and strongly, avoiding panic and inspiring others to keep their calm. Over time this has filtered down to the lowest levels of our administration and our country is much more stable because of it.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]不是一个轻易失去 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]冷静的 [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]。在动荡混乱的年代， [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]始终坚定维持自我，避免恐慌并鼓舞大家保持镇定。正是因为他的努力，长期以来，随着叛乱和动荡的程度到的降，我们政府和国家才变得越来越稳定。

original: Don't Panic
translation: 别慌

original: Careful Maneuvering
translation: 谨慎策略

original: As the ruler of an ambitious early modern state it is hard to make friends with everyone. Sometimes paying careful attention to what is going on in the international community allows you to lessen the impact of past slights however. In [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] personal correspondence with the rulers of neighboring states [Root.Monarch.GetName] hopes to improve our standing in the world little by little.
translation: 作为一个雄心勃勃的早期现代国家的统治者，很难与每个人都保持友好关系。时常密切注意国际形势会能帮助你减轻过去忽视国际关系的影响。在 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 与邻国的统治者[Root.Monarch.GetName] 的个人信件中，希望能一点一点提升我国的国际地位。

original: We're really just misunderstood.
translation: 我们真的被误解了

original: Careful Diplomatic Maneuvering
translation: 谨慎的外交策略

original: The Great Cipher of [Root.Monarch.GetName]
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]的伟大密码

original: Ever since childhood cryptography has been a bit of a hobby for [Root.Monarch.GetName] and as [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has matured so have too [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] methods of making sure that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] secrets remain hidden. After the discovery of a series of opened letters it has become clear that more people than is fitting read our correspondence with the provincial governors. Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is confident that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] could increase security substantially.
translation: 自从儿童时代起，研究密码就是 [Root.Monarch.GetName] 的兴趣爱好。当[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 长大后，就用这兴趣来帮助自己隐藏秘密。在发现了一系列信件被公开之后，很明显越来越多的人阅读过我们与省长的信函。我们的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]很自信，认为自己能提升政府文件的安全性。

original: Let us make this our top priority!
translation: 让我们把这当做优先任务！

original: Let's not waste energy on this. The method will just spread eventually.
translation: 不要浪费精力了。保密方法迟早时会被泄露出去的。

original: New Cipher
translation: 新密码

original: Our ruler has introduced a new cipher of his own device to be used for certain limited administrative functions in our country. As state orders will now reach fewer eyes while being carried to the recipient we have been able to cut down on corruption and misuse of classified information. As more and more people learn of our new encryption method, however, the benefit of this new cipher is likely to wane.
translation: 我们的统治者在我国某些特定的政府部门中引进了他自己发明的新密码。由于现在国家指令在到达有关部门的途中，被关注的次数减少，我们能够减少腐败和泄密。但是随着越来越多的人了解我们的新加密方法，这种新密码的好处很可能会少。

original: Friends in Low Places
translation: 低处的朋友

original: It is said that every other performer, artist or thief in the capitals of our rivals is really an informant of [Root.Monarch.GetName]. With a keen personal interest in the comings and goings of just about anyone with any influence our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] often see opportunities long before our chief of espionage does. Lately the contacts of [Root.Monarch.GetName] have indicated that there are openings we might be able to use in countries of interest. This would require us to open the state coffers a bit however.
translation: 据说，每个在宿敌首都的演员，艺术家，甚至小偷都是 [Root.Monarch.GetName]的的眼线。由于个人对任何往来有影响力的人都感兴趣，我们的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]经常在我们的间谍总管之前抓住机会。进来[Root.Monarch.GetName] 的交流表明了有地方存在好好利用就能给我国带来收益的空隙，当然这需要一定的资金。

original: Money is just a number.
translation: 金钱只是数字

original: Let's leave the spying to professionals.
translation: 把间谍工作交给专业的

original: Twin Birth
translation: 双胞胎

original: Praise the heavens! [Root.Monarch.GetName] has given birth to two healthy children. In the commotion it is a bit unclear who the new royal heir will be...
translation: 感谢上帝！ [Root.Monarch.GetName] 生了两个健康的孩子。但另一反面，这又带来一个疑问——谁将是继承者···

original: The one that looks to be the stronger of the two.
translation: 那个看起来更强壮的

original: The one with the intelligent gaze of course.
translation: 那个看起来更聪明的

original: Twin Birth
translation: 双胞胎

original: Praise the heavens! [Root.Monarch.GetName] has fathered a pair of healthy twins. In the general commotion it is a bit unclear who the new royal heir will be...
translation: 感谢上帝！ [Root.Monarch.GetName]的老婆 生了两个健康的孩子。但另一反面，这又带来一个疑问——谁将是继承者···

original: The one that looks to be the stronger of the two.
translation: 那个看起来更强壮的

original: The one with the intelligent gaze of course.
translation: 那个看起来更聪明的

original: Learning from the mistakes of others
translation: 以人为鉴

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has always considered it a virtue to listen to the advice of those that came before [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] and to surround [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] with experienced advisors. It worries [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim], however, that [Root.Heir.GetName] might not fully realize what ruling [Root.GetName] entails. At some point this is a responsibility that [Root.Heir.GetName] will have to shoulder, and at that time it would probably be best if [Root.Heir.GetSheHe] had been more thoroughly introduced to the challenges of rulership.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]总是聆听[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]前辈的意见，并且雇佣了大量的幕僚围绕在[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]周围。但是[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]担心[Root.Heir.GetName]可能没认识到统治[Root.GetName]需要什么。某些程度上，这是[Root.Heir.GetName]早晚要承担的责任。另外，如果[Root.Heir.GetSheHe]能更加深入的了解统治时将面临何种挑战，那会更好。

original: We must teach [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] about Administration.
translation: 我们必须教[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]内政。

original: We must teach [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] about Foreign Affairs.
translation: 我们必须教[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]外交。

original: We must teach [Root.Heir.GetHerHim] about War.
translation: 我们必须教[Root.Heir.GetHerHim]军事。

original: [Root.Heir.GetSheHeCap] must go [Root.Heir.GetHerHis] own ways.
translation: [Root.Heir.GetSheHeCap]必须走自己的路。

original: Never too late to Learn?
translation: 活到老，学到老？

original: Realizing your own deficiencies and delegating to competent people that complement your own abilities is one of the most important aspects of sound rulership. [Root.Monarch.GetName] is a firm believer in listening to good advice and in improving [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] by listening to those more experienced. Over time, however, it may be possible to learn what comes natural to others. If we allow [Root.Monarch.GetName] to devote [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] fully a tutor would likely be able to improve his grasp of some of the more advanced parts of the running of the [Root.GetName] state.
translation: 发现自己的不足，并且找到那些有能力的人来弥补自己的不足，这是统治很重要的手段。[Root.Monarch.GetName]坚持广开言路，听取谏言，能提升[Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]。随时间，游客可能自然从他人身上学到什么。如果我们允许[Root.Monarch.GetName] 找个导师，他能更好的掌控 [Root.GetName] 国家。

original: Let [Root.Monarch.GetName] study the [Root.GetAdjective] Administration
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetName]学习[Root.GetAdjective]的内政

original: Let [Root.Monarch.GetName] study Foreign Affairs.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetName]学习外交事务。

original: Let [Root.Monarch.GetName] study War.
translation: 让[Root.Monarch.GetName]学习军事理论。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] time is better spent elsewhere.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]时间用来干别的事更好。

original: Unjust War
translation: 非正义战争

original: As negotiations draw closer in our current war [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been busy meeting with the envoys of our mutual friends and rivals. As the defenders against an unfair war of aggression we have the sympathy of the international community. Nothing is settled yet but we can be sure to have plenty of leverage in future negotiations.
translation: 随着我国目前战争谈判的临近，[Root.Monarch.GetName]正忙着与我们的盟友和敌人的使节们开会。作为反对非正义战争的捍卫者，我们得到国际社会的支持。虽然目前还没有解决问题，但我们可以确保在今后谈判中拥有充足的筹码。

original: Time to make a deal.
translation: 是时候成交了

original: Negotiation Leverage
translation: 谈判影响力

original: Our ruler's ability to convince people that they really want what we want has given us more leverage when negotiating.
translation: 我们的统治者的说服他人接受我们的要求的能力，在谈判中给了我们更多的影响力。

original: What we need is help to rebuild.
translation: 我们应该帮助重建

original: Expansion of the [Root.Religion.GetName] Faith
translation: [Root.Religion.GetName] 信仰扩张

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has made it [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] life work to spread the [Root.Religion.GetName] Faith and has quickly made a name for [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] among religious communities across our country. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] close ties to the [Root.GetName] $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has made clerics of various kind a common sight in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and an influential voice in the halls of power.\nOver time the fame of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has begun to spread even beyond our borders and our spies tell us that there are religious minorities among the subjects of our rivals who would support military expansion into their areas.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]把自己有限的生命投入到了无限的[Root.Religion.GetName]信仰扩张事业中，并让自己的威名响彻全国的宗教社会。[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] close ties to the [Root.GetName] $ESTATE_CHURCH$ has made clerics of various kind a common sight in [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] and an influential voice in the halls of power.\n长期以来， [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 的名声已经往境外传播，我们的间谍告诉我们说我们的宿敌对手中有宗教少数派，他们支持军事扩张到他们的地区。

original: We must defend our religious brethren!
translation: 我们必须保护我们的教友！

original: Religious Warrior
translation: 信仰战士

original: Let us avoid unnecessary bloodshed.
translation: 让我们避免不必要的牺牲

original: Support of the Pious
translation: 虔诚的支持

original: Many are contributing with what little they have to strengthen the state and its pious leader in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] struggle against the unfaithful. Our local clerics also report a surge of volunteers ready to take up arms to fight against the enemies of the faith.
translation: 许多人把自己仅有的东西都贡献出来加强自己国家和领袖，帮助支持[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]对抗异教的战争。 我们当地的神职人员还报告说，大批的志愿兵准备拿起武器，与异教徒作战。

original: Our prayers have been answered.
translation: 我们的祷告得到了回应

original: The Draw of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]
translation: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的盛世画卷

original: At best a vassal - patron relationship is a mutually beneficial affair where both parties can make further gains than would otherwise be possible. Under the firm hand of [Root.Monarch.GetName] many of the countries enjoying our protection have thrived. One of many benefits this brings us is that young princes and other notables from subject countries consider [Root.GetName] a good place to forge a career.
translation: 在最好的情况下，附庸关系是一种互惠互利的关系，双方都能取得比本来可能更多的收益。在 [Root.Monarch.GetName] 的强力手腕下，很多乐意接受我们保护的国家变的繁荣起来。其带来的好处之一就是年轻的王子和其他的名人认为在[Root.GetName]能找到更好的职业前景。

original: Let them compete for the honor to serve in our administration.
translation: 让他们视进入我们政府工作为荣誉，并为之而竞争。

original: The most talented will be given the right to serve in our armies.
translation: 最杰出的人会获得竟如我们军队服役的荣誉

original: Demanded Support
translation: 要求支援

original: Legal Reform
translation: 法律改革

original: Like many states of similar size the outward unity of [Root.GetName] is partly a mirage. Locally any city, estate or even village may have its own rules and laws since time immemorial. Eager to reduce inconsistent legislation in our country the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has been withdrawing privileges and issuing new, nationwide, directives to bring order into chaos. This is, however, not always immediately successful. With a recent government directive is outright being ignored in one part of our country [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s authority is in question.
translation: 就像其他同等大小的国家，[Root.GetName]的外在统一就是镜花水月。自古以来，这个国家任何地方的城市、村庄、阶级都有自己的规则和法律。为了减少各地方不一致的法令， [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]一直致力于收回地方特权，颁布新的全国范围法令来消除乱七八糟的规定所造成的秩序混乱。当然，成效并不总能立竿见影。近来，我国一些地区开始完全无视中央政府颁布的法令，对[Root.Monarch.GetName]的权威造成了很严重损害。

original: Analyze their objections and thoroughly harmonize our legislation.
translation: 分析他们的反对意见，协调修改我们的立法。

original: Local Legal Reform
translation: 地方法律改革

original: We are harmonizing various local legislative eccentricities in this area in order to make it more fully conform to national laws and decrees.
translation: 我们正在协调在这个地区各个地方政府杂乱的规章制度，来使它完全符合全国统一的法规。

original: The time has come to use force!
translation: 到了使用暴力的时候了！

original: Every owned province in this §YArea§! will immediately have autonomy reduced by §G-15§!.
translation: §YArea§!地区每个拥有的省份马上降低§G-15§!的自治。

original: It's best for everyone if we just turn a blind eye.
translation: 睁一只眼闭一只眼对大家都好。

original: Finding money in unexpected places
translation: 意外之财

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] is well known for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] unsurpassed ability to find new sources of state income in the unlikeliest of places. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] recent audit of local numbers has turned up an entirely new source of revenue in one of our provinces, slowly but surely increasing the stream of money into state coffers.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]以[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]能够在最不可能的地方找到新的收入来源的天才能力而闻名天下。近来[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]在检阅地方政府的财政审计时发现了新的财源，这些钱都将缓慢但稳定地流入我们的金库。

original: Money!
translation: 钱！钱！钱！

original: Keeping to the Code
translation: 严守成规

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s strict enforcement and views regarding ethical conduct and corruption has helped make our state a more honest place. It is also not earning [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] many friends among our administrators and clerks. While we have deterred from taking bribes many are actively working to slow down the cogs of the government machinery through all the means available to them.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]对道德标准和腐败问题的严格态度使我们的国家政府更加诚实可靠，但这也让[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]找不到多少官僚朋友。当我们严厉打击贪腐的时候，也有许多心怀不满的家伙们正竭尽所能地拖延我们的国家机器……

original: In time we will have rooted them all out.
translation: 我们迟早要把他们找出来！

original: We can afford to bend our high principles a bit.
translation: 我们或许该在原则问题上更灵活。

original: Ignoring Corruption
translation: 无视腐败

original: In order to avoid alienating our administrators we are turning a blind eye to some of the more tolerable corruption in the government machinery. The many ways in which a man can enrich himself is after all considered a perk of a government job.
translation: 为了防止和官员疏远，我们对政府机构中一些尚可容忍的腐败视而不见。毕竟，当个公务员有各种途径赚点儿外快也没啥错嘛。

original: School of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]
translation: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]学派

original: The silhouette of our capital has never been as full of cranes and half built towers and monuments in our lifetime. The reign of [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been characterized by an ever increasing number of building projects both here and in other parts of our realm.\nThe increasing number of people employed in planning and erecting great buildings to the taste of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] has led to the development of a new and distinct architectural style. Internationally the demand for the great architects and builders of the [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] school is increasing and some foreign cities can now compete with us in our own style.
translation: 这儿是起重架，那儿是在建的高塔和纪念碑，这就是我们首都现在的剪影，不难看出[Root.Monarch.GetName]统治的一大特点就是四处大兴土木。\n越来越多的劳工被雇佣到建筑场地，迎合[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]品位的建筑如雨后春笋般林立而起，一种新潮而独特的建筑风格得以发展起来。[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]学派的建筑大师们也成了国际上炙手可热的人物了，有些外国城市已能够在我们的风格上与我们水平相近了。

original: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] must remain the grandest of cities!
translation: [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]必须是最伟大的城市！

original: Let's encourage our masters to spread this style further abroad.
translation: 鼓励我们的大师向外国传播我们的建筑风格。

original: Cultural Parangon
translation: 文化典范

original: Monumental Architecture
translation: 伟大的建筑

original: The capital of this province is famous for its ambitious architecture.
translation: 该省的省会城市以其野心勃勃的建筑而闻名天下。

original: The Lure of Easy Money
translation: 天上掉馅饼？

original: A number of economic investors have approached [Root.Monarch.GetName] asking for the right to develop one of the areas under our control. They would pay a lump sum for the right to extract revenue from our lands and it would then be up to them to collect the money in our stead. The investors are quick to point out that it is in their interest to invest in the local infrastructure to increase the chances that they will make more than the sum they have paid for the right to our area.
translation: 一些经济投资者找到[Root.Monarch.GetName]，请求得到授权来开发我们控制下的一个地区。他们会付一大笔钱来买断当地的财政收入，而之后这些土地上的税收就任由他们支配了。投资者们说他们将会投资当地基础设施建设来拉动当地经济的发展，为地区带来繁荣，从而使得他们的收益能够比现在这笔巨款还要大上许多。

original: I know a good deal when I see one!
translation: 成交！

original: Better play it safe.
translation: 还是保守些好。

original: Growing Businesses
translation: 蒸蒸日上的事业

original: The economy of this area has been jump-started by assigning it to responsible tax farmers who want to make the most from their investment. Using their own money they have invested in new technology and economic infrastructure, making the whole area thrive.
translation: 在那些承包土地的农民的努力下，这片地区的经济已经得到快速发展。那些农民用自己的钱投资发展当地技术和经济基础设施，使得整个地区都欣欣向荣。

original: Reckless Economic Policies
translation: 鲁莽的经济政策

original: By allowing tax farmers with little interest in long term growth to have their way with this area we have contributed to the rapid destruction of the local economic infrastructure. Recovery will come but it will take time.
translation: 那些投资者为了短期利益，毫无长远规划，对我们的土地资源和当地经济基础设施造成了严重破坏。一切都会恢复的，但是需要时间。

original: Economics of a [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的经济学

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] is well known for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] ceaseless energy and working habits. There are few hours in the night when the lights in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] chambers are not burning and royal decrees are known to leave [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName] both early in the mornings and late in the evenings. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] also seems to keep a constant watch over all business sectors in our country, foreigners have sometimes been amazed to learn that [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] will personally create regulations for even entirely new business ventures in the provinces.\nAs our dear [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] gets hold of new opportunities for growth in our country the only question is really if we have the resources to do all [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] wishes at the same time.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]是著名的工作狂，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]寝宫夜灯时常不灭，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]皇家政令也不分昼夜地从[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]传出。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]还时常关注我国的经济界，甚至会亲自为省份中新出的生意制定法律法规。外国人时常为[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]的这种举动感到惊讶。\n我们敬爱的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]亲自设定了国家的经济规划。现在唯一的问题是我们有没有足够的精力和资源来同时开展[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]所有的经济部署。

original: Money is not a problem.
translation: 钱不是问题。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] shall have what [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] needs and more.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]会得到[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]想要的，可能还会更好呢。

original: Another time perhaps.
translation: 再说吧。

original: Development in Manufacturing
translation: 制造业发展

original: The local economy in this area is developing rapidly after a series of decrees aimed to stimulate growth.
translation: 这个地区的经济在一系列旨在刺激经济的政令帮助下得到飞速发展。

original: The Lure of New Worlds
translation: 新大陆的诱惑

original: Ever since [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] childhood [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been fascinated by the tales of far-away places and as [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has been actively promoting voyages of discovery and colonization. As our colonial administrators now demand that we give them more support to fulfill our overseas ambitions [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] has been to raise the needed resources on [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] own, without burdening the coffers of the state.
translation: 早在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]童年时，[Root.Monarch.GetName]就对那些远方的神话传说十分着迷。作为[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]更是积极鼓励推动远洋航行和殖民活动。现在我们的殖民长官要求更大的支持来实现我国的殖民野望，陛下自己从[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]钱包里筹集了足够的开支，并没有动用[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]国家金库的一分一毫。

original: Best direct the aid to where it is needed the most.
translation: 好钢得用在刀刃上。

original: It is time to mount an expedition!
translation: 是时候去探险了！

original: Let us map the seas.
translation: 让我们绘出海岸线吧。

original: We need to develop our colonial infrastructure at home.
translation: 我们需要在国内发展殖民地设施。

original: Government Intervention
translation: 政府干预

original: The talents of [Root.Monarch.GetName] as a negotiator and broker is generally an asset in international negotiations but sometimes an opportunity arises that can be used to benefit our traders. A recent series of meetings with foreign emissaries has opened for an opportunity to give our domestic merchants leverage when exporting goods to foreign markets.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]作为协商者和中介代理人的天赋在国际协商中有重要价值，当然有些时候这种天赋还能给我国商人带来好处。近来，一系列和外国使者的外交磋商给我国商人的外贸出口带来了不少机遇。

original: Excellent!
translation: 太棒了！

original: A [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is above such matters.
translation: 一个[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]不应来操劳这些事。

original: Fear and Awe
translation: 恐惧与敬畏

original: During [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] reign [Root.Monarch.GetName] has by both word and action proven [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] ambitions as a Conqueror. Admired by the troops, an impromptu visit to an army encampment is now instilling a glorious dream of victory in the hearts of our soldiers.
translation: 在[Root.Monarch.GetName]统治时期，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]言辞和行动都验证了那响当当而又野心勃勃的名号：征服者。整个军队都爱戴着这位君主，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]一次军营私访正潜移默化地为每个士兵的内心带来胜利的光荣理想。

original: A [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s presence shall drive them to triumph!
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在上，无往不胜！

original: We should compose marching songs in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] name!
translation: 我们应该以[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]名义创作我们的军歌！

original: The Art of War
translation: 战争艺术

original: This age has seen few individuals with a tactical mind to rival that of our illustrious [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], [Root.Monarch.GetName]. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] has revolutionized the way we approach the battlefield and we foresee many great victories in our [Root.GovernmentName]'s future. [Root.Monarch.GetName] is contemplating writing a book on [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] methods. While this would help us spread knowledge on military tactics within our own army, it would surely reach our neighbors as well.
translation: 在这个年代，只有寥寥数人能在战略指挥军事天赋上比得上我们威名赫赫的[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]在我国的军事话改革上做出去多努力，我们甚至可以预见在其带领下我们的[Root.GovernmentName]将会获得一个又一个的伟大胜利。[Root.Monarch.GetName]正在考虑将[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]军事思想写成一本书。虽然它有助于在我军内推广新的军事战术，但这种创见性的军事思想也很有可能会被我们的邻国学了去。

original: To not share this progress would be a crime against mankind!
translation: 不分享这一先进的思想就是对全人类的犯罪！

original: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§! writes a book on military tactics.
translation: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§!撰写了一部军事战术著作。

original: They would celebrate us today, only to stab us in the back tomorrow.
translation: 他们今天会为我们喝彩，日后怕是会背后捅我们一刀。

original: We keep §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s§! methods to ourselves.
translation: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName][Root.Monarch.GetTitle]§! 的独家军事方略只能在我军内部传阅。

original: All Peace and No Play
translation: 处处和平，没有乐子

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been pacing around [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] quarters lately. Gossip says that it's matters of the heart making the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] anxious, but anybody familiar with the [Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan] would know that it's actually the current peace of the realm - a brave warrior such as [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] feels cooped up like a chicken in [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] rooms whenever there is no war to strategize over. Then again, [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]... Perhaps [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] could do something about it?
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]近来坐立不安，变着花样的折腾。有传言说[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]有心脏问题才使得[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]性格变得如此焦躁，但实际上了解这位[Root.Monarch.GetWomanMan]的人都知道这背后的真正原因是近来国家和平的环境——[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]这样勇敢的战士在和平的时代无处施展[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]军事才华，感觉就像一只被关在笼子里的小鸟。不过话说回来，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]可是 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]……或许[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]能做些什么？

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should host a tournament!
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]要举办一场比武大赛！

original: The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] should spend more time drilling [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] troops.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]要在训练[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]军队上消磨多余的精力。

original: Hosting Tournaments
translation: 举办比武大会

original: Our ruler is currently awarding brave warriors with much prestige for partaking, and particularly in winning, tournaments. People from all over the realm are inspired to prove their mettle.
translation: 我们的统治者正举办着比武大会，奖赏与荣誉等待着前来参与的勇敢战士们，那些胜出者更是能名利双收。这场大会鼓舞着全国上下的人们，他们纷纷想来这里证明自己的勇气。

original: Drilling Troops
translation: 部队演练

original: Our ruler has taken a personal interest in the military training of the capital and is often seen instructing the soldiers, if not sparring with them, in the practice grounds.
translation: 我们的统治者把个人兴趣转到了训练首都部队上，人们总能看见陛下在校场上训练士兵，或是和他们比试身手。

original: A Strict Etiquette
translation: 严格的礼仪

original: [Root.Heir.GetName] joined [Root.Monarch.GetName] for supper one evening. The rumors say that it did not go well. What apparently started out as an argument about etiquette soon led to the usually well-mannered heir barging out in the middle of the meal, closely followed by [Root.Monarch.GetName] yelling that the cur attempted to poison [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]!
translation: 这天晚上[Root.Heir.GetName]与[Root.Monarch.GetName]共进晚餐。传言说这顿饭吃的并不愉快，因为礼仪问题而引发的争执很快发展地一发不可收拾，往常注重礼仪的王储愤然离席，紧接着就传来[Root.Monarch.GetName]的咆哮声。[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]喊着什么“你这个卑鄙小人竟妄图毒害我！”

original: This can't be tolerated! [Root.Heir.GetName] will pay for this.
translation: 是可忍孰不可忍！ [Root.Heir.GetName]要为此付出代价。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetName] disowns §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!\n
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName]和§Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!断绝关系\n

original: It was probably a misunderstanding.
translation: 这多半是个误会。

original: The Power of Rhetoric
translation: 语言的艺术

original: Troubled by the current state of the war [Root.Monarch.GetName] has held a rousing speech for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] weary armies. Rumor is now spreading among noble and commoner alike - like a beacon [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] stood in front of them, the sun reflecting from [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] armor while [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] words stirred the soldiers to a new hope.
translation: 由于陷入战争泥潭，[Root.Monarch.GetName]对[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]疲惫的军队发表了一次鼓舞士气的演说。贵族和平民之间都流传着这么一个故事，说当时[Root.Monarch.GetName]站在台上演说，阳光照在[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 铠甲上，映衬得像一座屹立的灯塔， 而[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]每一句话都点燃了士兵们的希望。

original: We are tougher than they think.
translation: 我们比他们想象的更坚强。

original: The New Generation
translation: 新生代

original: Over the years, our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has shown a great interest in shaping our military and has personally trained many of the army's bright young minds. Through these protégés [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been able to spread [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] ideas through the ranks of our troops. The [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] believes the time has come for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] newest pupil to test his wings. How might he benefit our great [Root.GovernmentName] best?
translation: 长期以来，我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetName]在亲自塑造我们的军队上展现了巨大兴趣，并亲自训练出来许多年轻军官。通过这种方法，[Root.Monarch.GetName]让自己的思想在各级军人之间广泛传播。[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]相信是时候让[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最新的弟子证明自己的羽翼了。这个年轻人会为我们的[Root.GovernmentName]带来什么惊喜吗？

original: He should focus on reforms to improve the morale of our men.
translation: 他应该集中精力改善我们的士气。

original: Gain a skill §Y3§! Army Reformer in [Root.GetName]. This advisor is §G50%§! Cheaper for your country to employ.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]获得一名§Y3§!级陆军改革者。这个顾问便宜§G50%§!。

original: He shall train our troops, making them the most disciplined soldiers in the world!
translation: 他应该集中精力训练我们的士兵，让他们成为世界上纪律最严明的部队！

original: Gain a skill §Y3§! Commandant in [Root.GetName]. This advisor is §G50%§! Cheaper for your country to employ.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]获得一名§Y3§!级教官。这个顾问便宜§G50%§!。

original: We always need more men. He'd make a fine recruiter!
translation: 我们总是需要更多的人力，他应该成为一个募兵官。

original: Gain a skill §Y3§! Master Recruiter in [Root.GetName]. This advisor is §G50%§! Cheaper for your country to employ.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]获得一名§Y3§!级征兵官员。这个顾问便宜§G50%§!。

original: Gain a skill §Y2§! Army Reformer in [Root.GetName]. This advisor is §G50%§! Cheaper for your country to employ.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]获得一名§Y2§!级陆军改革者。这个顾问便宜§G50%§!。

original: Gain a skill §Y2§! Commandant in [Root.GetName]. This advisor is §G50%§! Cheaper for your country to employ.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]获得一名§Y2§!级教官。这个顾问便宜§G50%§!。

original: Gain a skill §Y2§! Master Recruiter in [Root.GetName]. This advisor is §G50%§! Cheaper for your country to employ.
translation: 在[Root.GetName]获得一名§Y2§!级征兵官。这个顾问便宜§G50%§!。

original: A Down-to-Earth Sailor
translation: 务实的水手

original: We have received word of a man rising quickly through the ranks of our navy. A born leader, yet of humble character, the seafarer has been brought to attention by recommendation of his fellow sailors. They claim, almost superstitiously, that the man has a natural affinity with the sea and that it would be a waste to not promote him.
translation: 我们已经从一个快速穿过我们海军队伍的人那里得到消息，有一位怀着谦逊品格的天生的领导人，航海家已经被来自他水手朋友的介绍信所吸引。他们几乎迷信的声称，那个男人与海洋有一种天生的亲和力，如果不提拔他绝对是对人才的浪费。

original: He'll make a fine admiral!
translation: 他将成为一位好的海军将领！

original: We could use an explorer!
translation: 我们可以利用他！

original: We don't need his services right now.
translation: 我们现在还不需要他。

original: Driving a Hard Bargain
translation: 铁腕谈判

original: Throughout the years many have come to fear our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] at the negotiating table. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] is utterly relentless, fierce as a lion and shrewd as a serpent. In the end most people give [Root.Monarch.GetName] whatever [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] wants just in order to escape [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] iron gaze. When our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] summoned the bankers to renegotiate the nation's loans, we all knew how it would end.
translation: 在过去的很多年里，许多人都在谈判桌上担心我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]毫不留情面，凶猛如狮，狡猾如蛇。最终绝大多数人给予[Root.Monarch.GetName]任何[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]所想要的，只要自己能逃离[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]吃人般的眼神。当我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]召集银行家们重新协商国家贷款的时候，我们都知道结果会如何。

original: The bankers will be tossing in their sleep for months to come!
translation: 那些银行家们几个月都将睡不着觉！

original: Renegotiated Loans
translation: 重新协商贷款

original: Our fierce ruler has managed to decrease the interest of our loans.
translation: 我们的铁腕领袖已经降低了我们贷款的利息。

original: The Last Drop
translation: 最后一根稻草

original: For a long time, our diplomats have been weary of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] and [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] tendency to insult everyone and anything. They do not get a moment of rest as they have to clean up all the messes our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] leaves behind. During a visit from the emissary of [angry_country.Monarch.GetTitle] [angry_country.Monarch.GetName] of [angry_country.GetName], our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] infuriated the man to such an extent that he threw a tantrum. Never have such insults been heard in our great halls!
translation: 长期以来，我们的外交官已经厌烦了[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]和[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]喜欢侮辱一切事物的倾向。他们没时间休息，因为必须清理我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 留下来的混乱。在[angry_country.GetName]的使者[angry_country.Monarch.GetTitle] [angry_country.Monarch.GetName]访问期间，我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] 最大限度地激怒了这个人，使他大发脾气。从来没有在我们的大厅里受到过这样的侮辱！

original: We must defend the honor of our great [Root.GovernmentName]!
translation: 我们必须保护我们伟大的[Root.GovernmentName]的荣誉！

original: No Cloud Without a Golden Lining
translation: 乌云背后总有一线光明

original: One of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] advisors, $TREASURER$$MASTER_OF_MINT$, recently discovered some funds were missing from the nation's treasury. $TREASURER_CAP_S_PRONOUN$$MASTER_OF_MINT_CAP_S_PRONOUN$ was not surprised to discover into whose pocket the money had gone. While at first $TREASURER_S_PRONOUN$$MASTER_OF_MINT_S_PRONOUN$ struggled to find a solution without offending the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle], now $TREASURER_S_PRONOUN$$MASTER_OF_MINT_S_PRONOUN$ has an interesting idea. Why not make use of the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s “talents” to refill the coffers?
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]的顾问之一， $TREASURER$$MASTER_OF_MINT$，最近发现国库失窃。$TREASURER_CAP_S_PRONOUN$$MASTER_OF_MINT_CAP_S_PRONOUN$发现了钱消失却并不惊讶。尽管起初 $TREASURER_S_PRONOUN$$MASTER_OF_MINT_S_PRONOUN$努力想找到一个不冒犯[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的解决方案，而现在$TREASURER_S_PRONOUN$$MASTER_OF_MINT_S_PRONOUN$却有了一个有趣的想法。为什么不利用[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的“才能”来补充国库呢？

original: It is for the good of the [Root.GovernmentName]!
translation: 这是为了[Root.GovernmentName]好！

original: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§! agrees to set up an embezzlement scheme together with §Y$TREASURER$$MASTER_OF_MINT$§! in order to refill the treasury.
translation: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§! 同意与§Y$TREASURER$$MASTER_OF_MINT$§!一起设立一个挪用公款的方案用以填充国库。

original: Two wrongs do not make a right.
translation: 对就是对，不对就是不对。

original: We accept the loss of funds and do not try to rectify it through any dubious means.
translation: 我们接受资金的流失，不以任何有问题的方式修正。

original: Ink Is Thicker Than Blood
translation: 墨水比血液更浓

original: The future is uncertain as [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] remains childless. As each year passes our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] only grows older, the prospect of an heir diminishes. We have scoured the [Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] family tree for any relatives our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] might adopt. While their claim would be weak, at least it would give us some sense of stability.
translation: 并不确定[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]以后是不是仍然没有孩子。随着时间的推移我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]只有年龄在增长，有继承者的可能却逐渐式微，我们已经走访了[Root.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] 族谱中任何 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]可能会选为继承者的亲戚，也许他们并不值得我们这样做，但至少这样能给我们一丝安慰。

original: We have heard impressive things about Maria [adoptive_country_1.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] of [adoptive_country_1.GetName].
translation: 我们已经听到了[adoptive_country_1.GetName]的玛利亚[adoptive_country_1.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]令人印象深刻的事情。

original: Alexander [adoptive_country_2.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] of [adoptive_country_2.GetName] is an esteemed commander.
translation: [adoptive_country_2.GetName]的亚历山大[adoptive_country_2.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]是一个受人尊敬的指挥官。

original: No one speaks ill of Stephanos [adoptive_country_3.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName] of [adoptive_country_3.GetName].
translation: 没人敢说[adoptive_country_3.GetName]的斯特凡诺斯[adoptive_country_3.Monarch.Dynasty.GetName]的坏话。

original: We do not need a contemptible foreigner on the throne!
translation: 我们不需要一个可鄙的外国人坐在王座上！

original: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§! remains without an heir.
translation: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§!仍然没有继承者。

original: Work and Pleasure
translation: 工作与乐趣

original: Our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is known for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] frivolous and oftentimes scandalous lifestyle. Up until now, the most shameful kinds of conduct have been hidden behind closed doors. Things seem to be changing, however. [Root.Monarch.GetName] has brought [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] favorite lover, a known crook, to court...
translation: 我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]以[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]轻率和时常令人反感的生活方式而闻名于世。直到现在，最可耻的行为已经被深深的掩藏。然而，事情似乎在改变，[Root.Monarch.GetName]已经将 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]最喜欢的情人——一个知名的骗子，送去了法院……

original: She obviously has talents. Let us put her to work.
translation: 她显然很有才能，让她去做吧。

original: He obviously has talents. Let us put him to work.
translation: 他显然很有才能，让他去做吧。

original: It would not look good.
translation: 这看起来并不好。

original: The lover of §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§! is kept from the public eye.
translation: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§!并不受众人的待见。

original: A Night to Remember
translation: 令人铭记的夜晚

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is well know – or infamous, rather – for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] indulgent nature and lavish lifestyle. While our administrators often complain about this drain on governmental funds, knowing how to arrange impressive parties is a resource in itself. [Root.Monarch.GetName] has made our [Root.GovernmentName] many friends through [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] balls and banquets. Now [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is planning another grand event, however, the guest of honor is yet to be decided.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]闻名于——或者说臭名招著于[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]放纵的天性和奢侈的生活方式。尽管我们的管理人员经常抱怨政府资金的流失，但也知道如何安排出令人印象深刻的聚会本身也是一种资源。[Root.Monarch.GetName]已经通过[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]胡说八道和宴会结交了我们的[Root.GovernmentName]许多朋友。现在[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]正在计划另一个盛大的活动，尽管座上宾仍未确定。

original: [invitee_1.Monarch.GetTitle] [invitee_1.Monarch.GetName] of [invitee_1.GetName] enjoys a good celebration.
translation: [invitee_1.GetName]的[invitee_1.Monarch.GetTitle] [invitee_1.Monarch.GetName]享受着庆祝活动。

original: We should try to impress [invitee_2.Monarch.GetName], the [invitee_2.Monarch.GetTitle] of [invitee_2.GetName].
translation: 我们应该试着给[invitee_2.Monarch.GetName]——[invitee_2.GetName]的[invitee_2.Monarch.GetTitle]留下一个深刻的印象。

original: Let's improve relations with [invitee_3.GetName] by inviting [invitee_3.Monarch.GetTitle] [invitee_3.Monarch.GetName].
translation: 让我们通过邀请[invitee_3.Monarch.GetTitle] [invitee_3.Monarch.GetName]的方式改善与[invitee_3.GetName]的关系。

original: They are all such bores! The event will be better without them.
translation: 他们所有人都令人讨厌！没有他们会更好。

original: No foreign ruler is invited to the event.
translation: 没有外国的统治者会被邀请参加活动。

original: Turning a Profit
translation: 利润回流

original: While the greed of [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has certainly hurt our nation's economy, [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] endless pursuit of quick money is not always fruitless. Sometimes the business ventures [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] invests in pay off and today is such a day.
translation: 虽然 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]的贪婪确实伤害到了我们国家的经济，但他对快钱无尽的追求并不总是毫无意义的。有时候，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]投资的商业冒险是有回报的，而今天就是这么一天。

original: Living in the moment can be sweet indeed!
translation: 真想一直活在这么一刻！

original: An Iron Fist
translation: 铁拳

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has been displeased with the latest reports from our province [lazy_province.GetName]. [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] is certain that the worthless peasants are to blame. Perhaps we shall make an example of some of them in order to encourage the rest to work harder?
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]已经不满意于我们 [lazy_province.GetName]省最新的报告。[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]确定这些无用的农民应当负全责。也许我们可以拿他们中的一些人来杀鸡儆猴用以刺激剩下的人更努力地工作？

original: Show them the price of sloth!
translation: 让他们知道懒惰的代价！

original: We cannot risk an uprising, then no one would be working.
translation: 我们不能拿他们可能会起义来冒险，这样就没人工作了。

original: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s§! bloodthirst is reined in... for now.
translation: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§! 的嗜血性格暂时得到了控制。

original: Cruel Overlord
translation: 残忍的宗主

original: People of this province have been treated cruelly by their lord, which in turn has created a great deal of unhappiness and unrest.
translation: 这个省的人民被他们的宗主残忍的修理了，现在他们反过来制造了巨大的动乱和不幸。

original: Employer of the Decade
translation: 十年的雇主

original: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] is not always easy to deal with – [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] thoughtless approach and total lack of discretion has offended many throughout the years. However, there is one group of people who appreciate [Root.Monarch.GetName]'s naivety. [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] advisors have realized that our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is easy to persuade and gets excited about almost any proposition. As they are so content we have been able to lower their salaries somewhat. It is not as if we haven't got plenty of brilliant candidates waiting in line!
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 并不总是好打交道的—— [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]不经过大脑的方法和丝毫没有的谨慎感多年来得罪了许多人。然而有一群人却喜欢[Root.Monarch.GetName]的天真。[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] 顾问已经意识到我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]非常好说服，并对绝大多数提案感到兴奋。因为他们是如此容易得到满足，我们已经降低了他们的一些薪水。但这并不是因为我们没有那么多闪闪发光的继承者。

original: A little competition will only make them work harder!
translation: 一点小小的竞争会让他们更努力地工作！

original: Naive Employer
translation: 天真的领导人

original: Our nation's ruler is excitable and willing to try almost any new idea, making him a popular among advisors.
translation: 我们国家的领导者特别容易兴奋，并几乎愿意尝试任何新的想法，这使他在顾问中备受欢迎。

original: Saved by [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] Nerves
translation: 因[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]莽撞而得救

original: This has gone too far, but what else could we expect from the scoundrel [assassination_nation.Monarch.GetTitle] [assassination_nation.Monarch.GetName] of [assassination_nation.GetName]? Last night, our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] survived an assassination attempt by the skin of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] teeth. For once we give thanks for [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] skittish disposition, because without it the poisoned dagger surely would have found its target. The guards managed to capture the would-be killer and after some encouragement from our interrogator, we now know exactly whom to blame...
translation: 一切都发生的太快，但我们对[assassination_nation.GetName]的恶棍[assassination_nation.Monarch.GetTitle] [assassination_nation.Monarch.GetName] 又该抱有什么期望呢？昨晚，我们的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 万幸在一场暗杀行动中活了下来。这次我们因感谢 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]轻率的布置，如果不是因为如此，那涂了剧毒的匕首早就解决了它的目标。守卫设法抓住刺客，经过审问者的情报，我们现在明确知道了谁将负此责任……

original: A dagger to the back? We will not take this insult lightly!
translation: 一个暗箭伤人的伎俩？我们绝不接受这个耻辱！

original: An Accidental Compliment
translation: 意外的恭维

original: During a banquet our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] got into a discussion about food and sweet delicacy. While most of the involved parties remained steadfast in their assessment, arguing the strength of the local cuisine, the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] made an awkward statement when [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] let slip [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] opinion - 'I always thought [cool_neighbor_country.GetName] had the best cheese platters! Ours are completely tasteless by comparison!'\n\nWhile our chef was gravely insulted, [cool_neighbor_country.Monarch.GetTitle] [cool_neighbor_country.Monarch.GetName] of [cool_neighbor_country.GetName] must have had spies present at the event as one of [cool_neighbor_country.Monarch.GetHerHis] emissaries later delivered us a large crate of cheese, completely free of cost.
translation: 在宴会上，我们的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 参与了关于食物和甜品的讨论。在争论哪里的美食更好时，大多数利益相关者都坚持他们自己的观点为各自的地区美食赞颂，当[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]放弃[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 观点时，[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]提出了一个与众不同的的观点——“我一直认为 [cool_neighbor_country.GetName]有着最好的奶酪拼盘！相比之下我们自己的则显得全然无味！”\n\n虽然我们让厨师不高兴了，但[cool_neighbor_country.GetName]的[cool_neighbor_country.Monarch.GetTitle] [cool_neighbor_country.Monarch.GetName] 应该也派有密使出席了此次宴会，因为后来[cool_neighbor_country.Monarch.GetHerHis]的使节给我们送了一大堆奶酪，并且完全免费。

original: Oh, that oblivious [Root.Monarch.GetName]!
translation: 噢，那一定是[Root.Monarch.GetName]

original: [cool_neighbor_country.Monarch.GetName] was pleased by our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s lack of tact.
translation: [cool_neighbor_country.Monarch.GetName]很欣赏我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的钝感力。

original: [Root.GetName]'s Finest
translation: 最优秀的[Root.GetName]士兵

original: For the armies of our great [Root.GovernmentName], nothing but the finest [Root.GetAdjective] soldiers will do! [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] has spent many sleepless nights pondering the future of our military and has concluded that we need to set higher standards. While the number of available men would certainly be smaller as a result, we could expect more of our soldiers in battle.
