translation: 对于我们伟大的 [Root.GovernmentName]军队，没有什么是出色的[Root.GetAdjective]士兵所无法做到的！[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName] 花了许多个不眠之夜思考我们军队的未来，并得出结论我们必须设立一个更高的标准。尽管达标人员将会因此减少，但我预计将会有更多优秀的士兵参战。

original: Indeed, we shall have quality over quantity!
translation: 确实，质量应优于数量！

original: We cannot afford to turn able-bodied men away.
translation: 我们负担不起裁军的代价。

original: The ideas of §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§! are dismissed.
translation: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§!的提议被驳回。

original: Military Perfectionism
translation: 军事完美主义

original: Our ruler only allows the best soldiers to join the army, which increases the overall quality but decreases its size.
translation: 我们的统治者只允许最优秀的士兵参军，这样整体的素质提高了，总的规模却减小了。

original: Advising an Advisor
translation: 咨询顾问

original: Everybody knows that the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] isn't very popular among the members of the court. While most people tolerate [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] vindictive persona, likely out of fear of any other behavior, one advisor has recently had more than one dispute with our ruler. Stating unconvincingly that 'it is strictly business', $TREASURER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$ is now threatening to leave court. However, there is a language all administrators understand...
translation: 众所周知， [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]在法院中并不是非常受欢迎。大多数人都忍受着[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 两面三刀，可能是出于对其他任何行为的害怕，一位顾问最近不止一次与我们的统治者有过争议。难以置信的是“这只是个交易而已。”目前，$TREASURER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$都以辞职作为要挟。然而，这里有一种大家都听得懂的话……

original: Let our money talk.
translation: 让我们拿钱来说话。

original: The advisor is strongly encouraged to forget about the disagreements.
translation: 应建议顾问忘掉这些分歧。

original: We don't need $TREASURER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$.
translation: 我们再也不需要$TREASURER$$NATURAL_SCIENTIST$$PHILOSOPHER$$ARTIST$$THEOLOGIAN$$MASTER_OF_MINT$$INQUISITOR$。

original: A Call to Arms
translation: 战斗呼声

original: The name [Root.Monarch.GetName] is known far beyond the borders of our [Root.GovernmentName]. Not only is she our exalted [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] – she is also famous for her military prowess. Up until now she has been contributing from the safety of the war room, however, there are voices who call for her presence on the battlefield. They increase in number as well as in strength for every passing day.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetName] 的名气早已并不仅仅局限于我们 [Root.GovernmentName]境内。这并不是因为她是我们尊贵的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]——她是以她的军事实力闻名的。到目前为止，她一直在为着战区的军事防御做贡献，但这一直有着一个让她参战的呼声。并且这样的呼声一次次的壮大。

original: We will follow her until the grave!
translation: 我们将随她征战到死！

original: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§! is made general.
translation: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetName]§!将被任命为将军。

original: We cannot risk the life of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle].
translation: 我们不能拿[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的生命作冒险。

original: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§! is not made general.
translation: §Y[Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetName]§!没有被任命为将军。

original: A Call to Arms
translation: 战场的呼唤

original: The name of [Root.Heir.GetName] is known by everyone of importance in our [Root.GovernmentName], as she is our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s heir. While less people know, it remains just as true – our heir possesses an impressive military prowess. Up until now she has been contributing from the safety of the war room, however, there are voices who call for her presence on the battlefield. They increase in number as well as as strength for every passing day.
translation: 众所周知，由于[Root.Heir.GetName]是我们[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的继承人，她对我们[Root.GovernmentName]十分重要。然而有一个真相却鲜为人知——我们的这位继承人手握重兵。到目前为止，她已经在安全的营帐内为保家卫国贡献良多，然而现在有不少人都希望她亲自出现在战场上。他们的人数和声音与日俱增。

original: We will follow her until the grave!
translation: 赴汤蹈火，在所不辞！

original: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! is made general.
translation: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!被任命为将军了。

original: We cannot risk the life of our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle]'s heir.
translation: 我们不能拿[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的生命冒险。

original: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§! is not made general.
translation: §Y[Root.Heir.GetName]§!不会被任命为将军。

original: their home
translation: 他们的家乡

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died while leading our troops at $NAME$.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]在$NAME$领兵作战时不幸殉国。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died while leading the siege of $NAME$.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]在$NAME$指挥围攻时不幸牺牲。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died while marching an army through $NAME$.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]在行军通过$NAME$时去世。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died in while the army was camped in $NAME$.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]率兵驻扎于$NAME$时死去。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died naturally of old age.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]寿终正寝。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died suddenly in a choking accident.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]因事故窒息而亡。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died from a wound inflicted while sporting.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]在运动时因伤口感染而亡。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] fell down a set of stairs to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] death.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]摔下楼梯，这导致了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]死亡。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died suddenly from a burst ulcer.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]突发溃疡而亡。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died from pneumonia following a common cold.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]因感冒并发的肺炎而亡。

original: A sudden illness took [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] from us too early.
translation: 一场突发的疾病使得[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]英年早逝。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died unexpectedly from food poisoning.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]因食物中毒而意外身亡。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] was the victim of a seemingly unlikely hunting accident.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]在一次匪夷所思的狩猎事故中成为了受害者。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died from a heart failure.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]亡于心力衰竭。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] died from dysentery.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]死于痢疾。

original: [GetSheHeCap] died in an accident while leading [GetHerHis] troops during an exercise.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]死于在率领[GetHerHis]军队训练时遭遇的意外事故。

original: While [GetSheHe] never flinched in the face of danger it was old age that eventually got to [GetHerHim].
translation: [GetSheHe]从未在面对危险时有过退缩，但最终，年已迟暮的[GetHerHim]还是离开了我们。

original: [GetSheHeCap] died from an illness contracted in the field.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]死于在前线染上的疾病。

original: [GetSheHeCap] was hit by a stray bullet while valiantly inspecting the trenches during a siege.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]在围城期间冒着生命危险视察战壕，不幸被流弹击中。

original: [GetSheHeCap] went down with [GetHerHis] ship like a true captain.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]像位真正的船长一样随[GetHerHis]座舰一同沉入了海底。.

original: [GetSheHeCap] died valiantly in the middle of an engagement with enemy troops.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]在一场遭遇战中英勇殉国。

original: [GetSheHeCap] died at sea after having contracted an unfortunate illness.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]在海上染疾而终。

original: [GetSheHeCap] died while marching an army through $PROVINCE$.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]在行军经过$PROVINCE$时不幸身亡。

original: [GetSheHeCap] died at sea after having contracted an unfortunate illness.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]在海上染疾而终。

original: [GetSheHeCap] died in the army camp in $PROVINCE$.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]死在了$PROVINCE$的军队行营中。

original: [GetSheHeCap] died for mysterious reasons in $PROVINCE$.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]在$PROVINCE$神秘死亡。

original: [GetSheHeCap] died in an accident during a drilling session.\nThe drilling has now stopped.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]死于军演行动的事故。\n军演停止。

original: Our realm will miss [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] fair and impartial rulings.
translation: 整个王国都会怀念[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]公正与公平。

original: Our people mourn the passing of the most virtuous [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] in our lifetime.
translation: 我们的人民会终生哀悼高尚的[Root.Monarch.GetTitle]的离去。

original: Our people remember [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] as a kind-hearted and loving ruler.
translation: 我们的人民会记住[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]这位热心而有爱的统治者。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] was never afraid of breaking old traditions in order to advance our goals.
translation: 为了实现我们的目标，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]从未害怕过打破旧时代的桎梏。

original: No doubt [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is now already making valuable contacts in the afterlife.
translation: 毫无疑问，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]此生构建了珍贵的人际网。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] brought peace and order to our realm.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]为我们的王国带来了和平与秩序。

original: Undoubtedly [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has taken many of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] secrets to [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] grave.
translation: 毫无疑问，[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]把[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]诸多秘密一同带进了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]坟墓。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] is mourned by an army of informants.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]受到了大批情报人员的哀悼。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] is mourned by [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] many descendants.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]受到了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]众多子嗣的哀悼。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] advisors assure us it was best this way.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]的顾问们告诉我们，这是最好的方式。

original: Our subjects lament the passing of such a benign overlord.
translation: 我们的臣民对这样一位仁慈君主的去世感到惋惜。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] energy and conviction brought many unbelievers into the fold.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]精神与信念引领了许多异教徒归入正道。

original: We may never again know a ruler of such virtue and spiritual stature.
translation: 我们可能再也无法见到这样的一位道德与精神都如此高尚的统治者了。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] well-planned decisions strengthened our position in the world.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]那些计划周详的决策巩固了我国的国际地位。

original: At the end we will all be judged.
translation: 我们都将在末日时受到审判。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] talent for finding money anywhere has made us a richer country.
translation: 在制造财富方面，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]天赋让我国成为了一个更加富裕的国家。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] strong character made our country a more honest place.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]性格刚正不阿，让我们的国家成为了诚信之邦。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] memory shall live forever in the many buildings [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] has left behind.
translation: 我们对[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]追思会永远地留存在[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]留下的那些建筑中。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] Scholarly pursuits brought both innovation and fame to our realm.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]学术追求给我国带来了革新和荣耀。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] shaped the economic life of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] age.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]塑造了属于[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]那个时代的经济构架。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] tireless efforts to improve our economy will be sorely missed.
translation: 人们将非常怀念[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]那些为振兴经济所做出的不知疲倦的努力。

original: Our colonists shall mourn the loss of their great benefactor.
translation: 我们的殖民者们会哀悼他们赞助者的离世.

original: Negotiations with foreign rulers will seem quiet and bleak without [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim].
translation: 没有了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]，与外国领导人的谈判将前景堪忧。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] sweet words have kept the world at bay. Who will protect us now?
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]如簧巧舌曾经牵制了整个世界。 现在，由谁来保护我们呢？

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] intricate maneuvering left our enemies dazed and confused.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]用兵之道复杂多变，让敌人眼花缭乱。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] daring charges into enemy lines have left a lasting impression on every soldier of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] generation.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]那份冲锋陷阵的英勇身姿，成为了[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]敌人们心中难以磨灭的梦魇。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] harsh bargaining has left mercenary captains destitute throughout our lands.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]那些严苛的讨价还价把佣兵队长们折腾得一贫如洗。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] constant watch always kept us on our toes.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]那些时刻不断的监视总是让我们保持警觉。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap] inspired a generation to take up arms against our enemies.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHeCap]鼓舞了一整代人拿起武器保家卫国。

original: The curriculum [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] created for our officers will be used by generations to come.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]为我国军官打造的训练课程将沿用数代.

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] enthusiasm for the sea has left us with a stronger navy.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]那份对海洋的热忱给我们留下了一支强大的海军。

original: Our friends will cherish this day.
translation: 我们的伙伴会珍视这一天。

original: Our accountants shall not miss [Root.Monarch.GetHerHim] but [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] nephews surely will.
translation: 我们的会计不太会怀念[Root.Monarch.GetHerHim]，但是 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]子侄们一定会。

original: We can only hope [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] successors will do more to keep the dynasty alive.
translation: 我们只能希冀[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]后继者们能加把劲为这个王朝续命了。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] drunken stupors and expensive tastes has left the country both poorer and worse governed than it was when [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] was crowned.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]醉酒昏聩以及奢侈的品味让这个国家比[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe]初登大宝时更加贫弱。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] sinful life brought nothing but shame to our country.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]罪恶一生只给我国带来了耻辱。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] all consuming lust for money and wealth shall not be missed.
translation: 我们不会怀念[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]那些对金钱和财富的强烈渴望。

original: Our religious minorities will mourn the passing of someone of [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] great tolerant nature.
translation: 我国的少数派宗教信徒们会沉痛地哀悼[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]离世，怀念那伟大的宽容之心。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] evil deeds shall be remembered for generations to come.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]兽行将会被每一代人所铭记。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] naive meddling in foreign affairs brought nothing but misunderstandings and new enemies.
translation: 在国际事务中，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]天真干预只给我们带来了误解与更多的敌人。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] cowardly conduct on the battlefield shall forever be [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] legacy.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]那些在战场上的懦弱行径将作为[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]遗产永存于世。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] careless handling of secret information made our secrets common knowledge.
translation: 在一些涉及机密的事情上，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]粗心大意经常搞得我们的秘密世人皆知。

original: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap] constant meddling in every infrastructure project has left our country with a long list of expenses that we will not miss.
translation: 在一些基建项目上，[Root.Monarch.GetHerHisCap]持续干预经常给我们留下长长的账单，我们可不会怀念这个。

original: Our subjects can rest easier now knowing that [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] reign of malevolent terror is over.
translation: 得知[Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]残酷统治终于结束之后，我们的臣民们终于可以睡个安稳觉了。

original: Our enemies will surely be relieved at [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] demise.
translation: [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis]离去让我们的敌人松下一口气。

original: [GetSheHeCap] died too soon without being able to accomplish much of note.
translation: [GetSheHeCap]英年早逝以至于没能留下任何功名。

original: [GetHerHisCap] valiant attacks will be missed by our troops.
translation: 我们的军队会怀念[GetHerHisCap]英勇进攻。

original: [GetHerHisCap] cavalry troopers mourn [GetHerHim] as one of their own.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]骑兵军队把[GetHerHim]视作自己的一员而沉痛地哀悼。

original: Our troops will greatly miss [GetHerHis] attention to their safety.
translation: 我们的军队会很怀念[GetHerHis]那些在安全方面的关怀。

original: Our troops will greatly miss [GetHerHis] attention to their health.
translation: 我们的军队会深深铭记[GetHerHis]那些健康方面的关注。

original: [GetHerHisCap] ruthless tactics could inspire great fear in our enemies.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]那些残酷无情的策略会让我们的敌人陷入深深的恐惧。

original: [GetHerHisCap] inspirational speeches will be remembered by generations of soldiers.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]那些鼓舞人心的演讲将会激励一代又一代的士兵。

original: [GetHerHisCap] infantry troopers mourn [GetHerHim] as one of their own.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]步兵军团将[GetHerHim]视作了自己的一员那样沉痛地哀悼着。

original: [GetHerHisCap] timely arrivals saved many a battle.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]及时出现拯救了多场战斗。

original: [GetHerHisCap] mere presence seemed to ease the worst of hardships.
translation: 仅是[GetHerHisCap]存在似乎就缓解了最糟糕的苦难。

original: [GetHerHisCap] attention to siege techniques made every investment worthy.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]那些对攻城技术的关注让每一笔投资都值回了本钱。

original: The artillery corps mourns [GetHerHis] passing as if [GetSheHe] was one of their own.
translation: 整个火炮军团都哀悼着[GetHerHis]离去，就好像[GetSheHe]是他们中的一员那样。

original: [GetHerHisCap] demise will greatly gladden traders of all nationalities but ours.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]死亡将会让其他国家所有的商人开心。

original: Citizens of ports all over the seaboard can now breathe more easily.
translation: 沿海地区港口的居民们终于可以过的轻松一点了。

original: With [GetHerHim] gone our enemies will feel safer with the shipping lanes again.
translation: 随着[GetHerHim]的离去，我们敌人的航海路线终于可以得到喘息。

original: [GetHerHisCap] feats of courage brought many new ships as prizes into our hands.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]英勇壮举给我们带来了许多新的船只，如同一枚枚军功章一般。

original: [GetHerHisCap] strong belief in defensive tactics has left a lasting impression on all who has been under [GetHerHis] command.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]那份对防守策略的笃信给每个在[GetHerHis]手下效力过的人都留下了深刻的印象。

original: [GetHerHisCap] attention to the ships under [GetHerHis] command greatly increased the durability of our navy while [GetSheHe] served.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]那份热忱、对[GetHerHis]麾下舰艇的关注，使得[GetSheHe]曾经服役过的我国海军更加牢靠。

original: [GetHerHisCap] daring maneuvers brought glory and experience to our crews.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]大胆用兵为我们的军队带来了荣耀和经验。

original: [GetHerHisCap] daring maneuvers brought glory and experience to our crews.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]大胆用兵为我们的军队带来了荣耀和经验。

original: [GetHerHisCap] constant drill of our gunnery crews greatly increased our sea power during [GetHerHis] lifetime.
translation: 在[GetHerHisCap]一生中，[GetHerHis]那份对炮组战术的持续钻研，为我国海军的进步做出了不可磨灭的贡献。

original: [GetHerHisCap] great appreciation for the art of sailing in general was revered by [GetHerHis] men.
translation: [GetHerHisCap]那份对于航海技术的重视被[GetHerHis]手下所敬仰。

original: [GetHerHisCap] ability to keep cool even in the face of grave danger will be greatly missed.
translation: 我们会怀念[GetHerHisCap]那份泰山崩于前而面不改色的淡定。

translation: 天马行空

translation: 冷静

original: Careful
translation: 谨慎

original: Secretive
translation: 守口如瓶

translation: 暗中策划者

original: Fertile
translation: 枝繁叶茂

original: Well Advised
translation: 兼听则明

original: Benevolent
translation: 仁慈

translation: 宽容

translation: 狂热

original: Pious
translation: 虔敬

translation: 点石成金者

original: Incorruptible
translation: 清正廉洁

translation: 巧匠

original: Scholar
translation: 学者

translation: 实业家

translation: 勤政

original: Expansionist
translation: 志在四海

original: Charismatic Negotiator
translation: 魅力非凡的说客

original: Silver Tongue
translation: 巧舌如簧

original: Tactical Genius
translation: 战术天才

original: Bold Fighter
translation: 勇士

original: Well Connected
translation: 礼贤下士

original: Strict
translation: 治军严明

original: Inspiring Leader
translation: 激励者

original: Martial Educator
translation: 军事教育家

original: Navigator
translation: 航海家

original: Babbling Buffoon
translation: 喋喋不休的小丑

original: Conqueror
translation: 征服者

original: Embezzler
translation: 腐败

original: Infertile
translation: 枯枝败叶

original: Indulgent
translation: 放纵不羁

original: Sinner
translation: 罪人

original: Greedy
translation: 贪婪

original: Cruel
translation: 残暴

original: Naive Enthusiast
translation: 幼稚的狂热者

original: Craven
translation: 怯懦

original: Loose Lips
translation: 大嘴巴

original: Obsessive Perfectionist
translation: 完美主义强迫症

original: Malevolent
translation: 歹毒

original: This ruler is a conqueror. We will be able to incorporate new lands into our realm more efficiently under this regime.
translation: 这个统治者是一位征服者。在他的统治下，我们能够有效地将更多土地变成我们国土的一部分。

original: This ruler is Tolerant. Religious minorities will thrive during our regime.
translation: 这个统治者待人宽容。宗教中的少数派将会在我们的领土上茁壮成长。

original: This ruler is Just. Due to a keen understanding of the many laws and customs of his realm our subjects trust us to rule rightfully and justly.
translation: 这个统治者处事公正。由于他对国家内许多法律和风俗习惯有独到的见解，我们的臣民都相信自己处于正确而公正的领导下。

original: This ruler is Righteous. Our people will be less likely to question our authority as they know that a righteous ruler always has their best interest in mind.
translation: 这个统治者为人正义。我们的人民不会倾向于质疑我们的权威，因为他们知道正义的统治者永远以他们的利益为重。

original: This ruler is Kind-Hearted. A great interest in the common men and women of the realm has made our ruler well-loved and our country more resistant to harsh times in general and the ravages of war in particular.
translation: 这个统治者是个热心肠。他对国内普罗大众的关爱让他深受爱戴。同时，我们的国家更能经受艰苦岁月的磨砺，尤其是战火的洗涤。

original: This ruler is a Free Thinker. Unbound by strict doctrines our ruler encourages everyone to try new things and reason freely about where to take our great country in the future.
translation: 这个统治者思维发散。他不受严格的教条束缚，鼓励每一个人尝试新事物并自由地思考将来将让我们伟大的国家走向何方。

original: This ruler is Well Connected. Our court and cabinet benefits from the wide network among the great minds of this era of our ruler.
translation: 这个统治者人脉通达。我们的宫廷和内阁都得益于他那张网罗了当代巨擘的宽广人脉网。

original: This ruler is Calm. By never losing temper or face our ruler will both inspire by example and be able to take well-thought-through decisions, allowing us to recover more quickly from any crisis the world might throw at us.
translation: 这个统治者处变不惊。他从不动怒，因此他得以能思考周密，让我们能从任何危机中全身而退。

original: This ruler is Careful. By carefully navigating around the various unspoken rules in interstate relations our monarch is able to lessen the impact of our actual transgressions.
translation: 这个统治者行事谨慎。通过谨慎地在各国之间斡旋，他能够尽量减少我们造成的过失对我们的不利影响。

original: This ruler is Secretive. A natural instinct to keep doors closed and letters encrypted trickles down and will make our entire government harder to infiltrate for our enemies.
translation: 这个统治者守口如瓶。他本能的知道关上门窗和给信件加密的必要，这让我们整个政府极难被敌国渗透。

original: This ruler is an Intricate Web-Weaver. Constantly hatching new plots our ruler is able to personally take on a great part of the responsibility for foreign intelligence.
translation: 这个统治者老谋深算。他不断策划新的密谋，甚至能亲自承担外国情报工作。

original: This ruler is Fertile. Due to the natural predisposition of our ruler to have many children we are at little risk to be without an heir for long.
translation: 这个统治者生育能力很强大。由于我们统治者多子多福，我们在将来很长一段时间都不必担忧继承人的问题。

original: This ruler is Well-Advised. Always ready to listen to the wise council of others our ruler attracts a greater number of people to our court and cabinet.
translation: 这个统治者能做到兼听兼信。他总是乐于聆听明智的谏言，这吸引了许多贤士来到我们的宫廷。

original: This ruler is Benevolent. Being seen as wanting to do good is a great asset when it comes to keeping our subjects calm.
translation: 这个统治者温和宽仁。如我们所见，乐于行善是一笔巨大的财富，这能帮助我们安抚我们的臣民。

original: This ruler is a Zealot. Being fanatically devoted to the true faith allows our ruler to inspire more people to convert and join the state religion.
translation: 这个统治者狂热敬神。我们的统治者疯狂地将他的一切投入到真正的信仰中，这激励更多人民皈依国教。

original: This ruler is Pious. Religiously devoted, spiritual and religious our ruler ensures that our state will not lose its course and inspire confidence in our faith.
translation: 这个统治者虔诚无比。他虔敬的精神将确保我国能走上正道，而不会迷失自我，同时，这也将激发我们对自己信仰的信心。

original: This ruler is a Lawgiver. Legislation is what builds up and unites a realm. Our ruler is intent on reducing the hundreds of laws and customs of the various part of our realm to create a more centralized and just set of laws.
translation: 这个统治者是一位立法者。法律是建立、统合国家的基础。我们的统治者致力于精简法律条文，以完成一套更加公正，更加符合中央集权思想的法令体系。

original: This ruler is Midas-Touched. The talent to make every project profitable is a great asset to the ruler of a country. Our state coffers shall never want for money as long as our ruler remains.
translation: 这个统治者能够点石成金。他的才能让每一个有利可图的机会都为国家创造财富。只要他一息尚存，我国的财源就不会枯竭。

original: This ruler is Incorruptible. In many ways building a modern state is a constant battle against corruption. State officials are always tempted to take bribes and wanting to care for your friends and relatives is a natural human instinct. By firmly rejecting all such notion and fighting it with contempt our ruler sets an example for the entire country to follow.
translation: 这个统治者清正廉洁。从多个方面看来，现代国家的建设就是一场反腐斗争。政府官员总是千方百计地揩油，想要任人唯亲。虽说这是人之常情，我们也要坚决抵制这股不正之风。我们的统治者为全国上下树立了一个好榜样。

original: This ruler is an Architectural Visionary. Improving the infrastructure is a necessity for any state of our age and this ruler is the one who can do it. Grand visions coupled with a great understanding and talent for keeping costs down makes this ruler a great asset to us.
translation: 这个统治者在建设方面富有远见。改善基础设施对这个时代的任何国家来说都万分重要，他就是可担此大任的能人。我们的统治者拥有宏大的设想，又善于理解他人意图，还掌握节俭的艺术，他是我国的无价之宝。

original: This ruler is a Scholar. The ambition to learn about the world and the governing principles of men and nature makes our ruler able to understand and implement new technology much more efficiently than would otherwise be possible.
translation: 这个统治者是一位学者。他那要洞悉万物的渴望让他能先于众人有效地理解并推行全新的技术。

original: This ruler is an Entrepreneur. By seeing the potential for new projects in any obstacle or opportunity our ruler contributes to an ever growing number of projects to bolster our economy.
translation: 这个统治者是个实业家。他能透过层层阻隔，把握种种机遇，看出新计划的潜力，他能为我们的经济提出各种有益的计划。

original: This ruler is Industrious. Never content to rest and through increasingly long work days our ruler is constantly managing the details of every province in the realm to maximize the output and collected revenue for all resources under state control.
translation: 这个统治者勤劳无比。他从未有片刻休息。通过日渐加长的工作日，我们的统治者不断对国境内每个省施行尽可能细化的管理，以使各资源的产量和国库的收入达到最大化。

original: This ruler is an Expansionist. Our ruler is personally invested in the claiming and settlement of new lands and is dedicated to ensure that colonial expansion remain a top priority for our state.
translation: 这个统治者热衷于开疆拓土。我们的统治者亲自参与新土地的移民申报和移民定居工作。他致力于确保殖民工作在我国处于首要地位。

original: This ruler is a Charismatic Negotiator. Through personal involvement in state diplomacy and negotiations our ruler is able to make others see things our way more often than would otherwise be possible.
translation: 这个统治者是个魅力非凡的说客。通过亲自参与外交谈判，我们的统治者能够让别国常常以别的方式看待我们的行为。

original: This ruler is considered to have a Silver Tongue. In our communication with other state our ruler is able to present our past actions in much more favorable lighting. Once our neighbors see the reasons for our actions they are much more likely to forgive us in the long run for any transgressions.
translation: 这个统治者有三寸不烂之舌。在我们与别国的交流中，我们的统治者能够示人以我们过去行为影响良好的一面。一旦我们的邻国了解到我们行为的真正原因，他们就能长期谅解我们的行动。

original: This ruler is a Tactical Genius. A great personal interest and investment in battlefield maneuvers and feints will result in a much greater interest and experience in these matters for all our generals.
translation: 这个统治者是一位战术天才。他在战场机动和伪装方面的强烈兴趣和刻苦专研将会使他获得更大的兴趣，并且，在这些事务中为我们所有将军积攒宝贵经验。

original: This ruler is a Bold Fighter. Believing Shock to be of great importance on the battlefield our ruler is never fearful of the consequences and encourages everyone to lead their troops right into the midst of the enemy should the situation require it.
translation: 这个统治者争勇斗狠。他相信搏斗对战场局势有重大影响。我们的统治者是无畏的征服者，他激励众人带领部队向敌阵冲锋。这种勇气应当是可贵的。

original: This ruler is a Fierce Negotiator. We will have an easier time convincing mercenary captains to fight for our cause for less pay than they would otherwise demand.
translation: 这个统治者言辞激烈。我们将更容易说服雇佣兵首领以更低廉的价格为我们而战。

original: This ruler is Strict. Due to taking a great interest in the behavior of the troops our ruler is able to instill a strict sense of discipline in everyone in our ranks, from the lowest to the highest.
translation: 这个统治者严于律人。由于他对部队的行为规范有极大兴趣，他向上上下下每一个人灌输严格的纪律意识。

original: Our ruler is an Inspiring Leader. Great personal leadership can lead to even the most cowardly men to finding their courage.
translation: 这个统治者能够鼓舞人心。他优秀的领导指引最怯懦的人找到勇气。

original: This ruler is a Martial Educator. Under the current regiment the education and training of our officer corps is one of our highest priorities.
translation: 这个统治者是个军事教育家。在当前情况下，部队的训练和教育是我们的首要任务。

original: This ruler is a Navigator. Personal involvement in everything from the curriculum for officers to the procurement of good charts and the rules and laws for shipping ensures that our ships aren't lost as often as those of our neighbors.
translation: 这个统治者是一位航海专家。他亲自插手各种采购事宜和航行的条令规定，以确保我们的船只永远不会像我们的邻国那样迷失航向。

original: This ruler is considered to be a Babbling Buffoon. While our ruler means well by personally engaging in diplomacy with our neighbors this is not coupled with a talent for conducting negotiations. Anyone is likely to have a harder time seeing the points we want to make and many of our negotiations are hampered by the ineptness of our ruler.
translation: 这个统治者被看做是个喋喋不休的小丑。尽管他在外交问题上与个邻国交谈甚欢，却并不能证明他确有这方面的才干。任何人都很难准确了解我们的真实立场，很多时候，我们统治者太过无能，对我们的谈判有害无利。

original: This ruler is an Embezzler. One of the things that drive our ruler is a great will and talent to use the state revenue for increasing personal wealth.
translation: 这个统治者是个腐败分子。他唯一感兴趣的事情就是把国库里的钱放进他私人的腰包。

original: This ruler is Infertile. Due to reasons beyond our control our monarch seems to have a much harder time than most to produce an heir.
translation: 这个统治者在某方面显得力不从心。由于某种不可控的原因，相较其他人，我们的君主似乎很难有一个继承人。

original: This ruler is Indulgent. Always seeking relief from a general apathy our ruler indulges in great amounts of stimulants as alcohol. Having an indulgent ruler reflects poorly on the entire country.
translation: 这个统治者放纵不羁。他一直在冷淡中寻找慰藉。我们的统治者在诸如酒精之类物品的刺激下日夜声色犬马。有一位纸醉金迷的统治者是国之不幸。

original: This ruler is widely regarded as a Sinner. Personal shortcomings in the leadership of our country have turned the religious establishment against us.
translation: 这个统治者的罪恶路人皆知。他领导国家时所体现出的个人缺点使宗教界站在了我们的对立面。

original: This ruler is Greedy. State revenue collection is growing increasingly iron-fisted and short-sighted under our ruler who will stop at nothing to try to increase our income. Destroying or harming every source of revenue the long term effects of this short-sighted behavior is a great decrease of tax income.
translation: 这个统治者欲壑难填。国家财政收入在我们统治者强硬却短视的政策下不断增长。他根本不会停下追求收入的脚步。这将彻底摧毁各种资源的长期增长，那些鼠目寸光的行为最终将导致税收的下降。

original: This ruler is seen as Cruel. Widespread tales of arbitrary and cruel actions by our ruler personally has greatly upset many of our subjects. This may not be enough to incite a rebellion in itself but any crisis is going to hit public opinion harder as nobody lacks for reasons to revolt.
translation: 这个统治者残暴无道。他专断残忍的传闻让我们的许多国民感到不安。这本身可能不足以激起叛乱，但这让任何危机都可能冲破公众的底线，因为人们总是不缺作乱的理由。

original: This ruler is a Naive Enthusiast. Blindly rushing ahead and constantly underestimating the consequences of our ruler ensures that our neighbors will be slower to forgive slights and transgressions.
translation: 这个统治者是个天真的狂热分子。盲目冲撞他的权威或是低估他将让我们的邻国花费更多时间来谅解蔑视和僭越的行为。

original: This ruler is Craven. Desperately fearful of physical combat our ruler stays as far away from the battlefields as possible. Our troops can't help but notice that they are on their own.
translation: 这个统治者是个懦夫。他非常害怕殒命沙场。他总是尽量远离战火。我们的部队很容易发现他们只能靠自己。

original: Often personally responsible for information breaches and leaks this ruler is generally too trusting and easily fooled. Unfortunately the sum of this is that our ruler does more harm than good to our counterespionage efforts.
translation: 这个统治者太轻信他人易受愚弄，许多重要的信息因此泄密。非常不幸，我们的统治者对我们的反间谍活动十分不利。

original: This ruler is an Obsessive Perfectionist. A keen interest in detail and minutiae is not always coupled with an equal talent for such things. Constantly causing interruptions and delays our ruler is doing a lot more harm than good when it comes to developing our internal infrastructure.
translation: 这位统治者有完美主义强迫症。他对细枝末节的兴趣大过他处理此事的才能。他不断在我们建设国内基础设施时大肆干扰，造成工期延误，这样恐怕弊大于利。

original: This ruler is seen as Malevolent. The actions of your ruler are often seen as motivated by malice or hostile intent. As a result any subject countries under our control are quick to anger and fear any action we take.
translation: 这个统治者蛇蝎心肠。你的统治者的行为常被视为动机不良。因此，任何原本臣服于我们的国家都很容易被我们惹恼，我们的一切行动都使他们感到害怕。

original: Glory Seeker
translation: 荣誉追逐者

original: This General is a glory seeker. Troops lead by this general will acquire more Prestige and Army Tradition than they otherwise would as they are always deployed where they will make the most visible difference.
translation: 这位陆军将领追求荣誉。他带领的军队会获得更多的威望和陆军传统，因为他们总在最能改变战况的位置现身，出尽风头。

original: Born to the Saddle
translation: 生于马背之上

original: This General was born to the Saddle. Cavalry led by this leader will be able to make better use of their flanking advantage.
translation: 这位陆军将领生于马背之上。他带领的骑兵会更好的利用侧翼优势。

original: Defensive Planner
translation: 防守策划师

original: This General is a Defensive Planner. Any troops lead by this leader will be more resilient to shock.
translation: 这位陆军将领精于谋划防守。他领导的军队更善于抵抗冲击。

original: Battlefield Medic
translation: 战地医生

original: This General is known as a Battlefield Medic. A larger than normal number of soldiers under this leader will be able to recover after battle to reinforce their unit back to strength.
translation: 这位陆军将领被称为战地医生。在他的领导下，更多的士兵能在战斗之后恢复并增援他们原属的部队。

original: Ruthless
translation: 残忍者

original: This General is Ruthless. Troops under the command of this leader will deal greater fire damage.
translation: 这位陆军将领很残忍。他指挥的军队能造成更多的火力伤害。

original: Inspirational Leader
translation: 鼓舞人心的将领

original: This General is an Inspirational Leader. Troops commanded by this leader will be quicker to regain morale in the face of defeat.
translation: 这位陆军将领是位鼓舞人心的将领。他指挥的军队在战败后恢复士气更快。

original: Master of Arms
translation: 武器大师

original: This General is a Master of Arms. Infantry commanded by this leader will be more efficient and be able to deal more damage.
translation: 这位陆军将领是位武器大师。他指挥的步兵效率更高并能造成更多伤害。

original: Goal Oriented
translation: 专注者

original: This General is Goal Oriented. Troops commanded by this leader will march more quickly towards their goal.
translation: 这位陆军将领专注于目标。他指挥的军队向目标行军的速度更快。

original: Hardy Warrior
translation: 坚韧的战士

original: This General is known as a Hardy Warrior. Troops commanded by this leader will be more resilient to harsh conditions and suffer less attrition.
translation: 这位陆军将领是位坚韧的战士。他指挥的军队对严酷环境更具耐性且损耗较低。

original: Siege Specialist
translation: 围城专家

original: This General is a Siege Specialist. Sieges commanded by this leader will be conducted in a more efficient manner and should be concluded more quickly.
translation: 这位陆军将领是攻城专家。他指挥的围城会更有效率，结束得也更快。

original: Cannoneer
translation: 炮手

original: This General is a Cannoneer. Known for a great fascination with gunpowder and cannons artillery commanded by this leader will be more efficient.
translation: 这位陆军将领是位炮手，因对火药与大炮的狂热而闻名。他指挥的炮兵会更有效率。

original: Extortioner
translation: 敲诈者

original: This Admiral is an Extortioner. Knowing how to best leverage an advantage of force allows our leader to do more with less and ships commanded by the extortioner will exert greater trade power than those lead by competing captains could.
translation: 这位海军将领是个敲诈者。他知道如何最好地利用军队的影响以达到事半功倍的效果，他指挥的舰队能产生更多的贸易竞争力。

original: Ruthless Blockader
translation: 残忍的封锁者

original: This Admiral is a Ruthless Blockader. Ships commanded by this leader will be able to maintain a blockade much more efficiently.
translation: 这位海军将领是个残忍的封锁者。他指挥的舰队能更高效地实施封锁任务。

original: Buccaneer
translation: 海盗

original: This Admiral is a Buccaneer. Privateers commanded by this leader will be more efficient.
translation: 这位海军将领是个海盗。他指挥的私掠船效率更高。

original: Prize Hunter
translation: 战利品猎手

original: This Admiral is a Prize Hunter. Captains commanded by this leader will be encouraged to seize more prizes and will capture more ships than others.
translation: 这位海军将领是个战利品猎手。他麾下的船长能夺取更多战利品并俘虏更多舰船。

original: Ironside
translation: 铁人

original: This Admiral is an Ironside. Ships commanded by this leader will suffer fewer damages than those commanded by other captains.
translation: 这位海军将领是个铁人。他指挥的舰队会承受更少的伤害。

original: Naval Engineer
translation: 海军工程师

original: This Admiral is a Naval Engineer. Ships commanded by this leader will be able to recover more quickly from damages sustained underway or during naval engagements.
translation: 这位海军将领是位海军工程师。他指挥的舰队能更快地修复航行和战斗中遭受的损伤。

original: Naval Showman
translation: 海军之花

original: This Admiral is a Naval Showman. Ships commanded by this leader will receive more prestige and naval tradition from battles.
translation: 这位海军将领爱出风头。他指挥的舰队能在战斗中获得更多的威望和海军传统。

original: Ram Raider
translation: 强袭专家

original: This Admiral is a Ram Raider. Galleys commanded by this leader will be more efficient and deal more damage in naval battles.
translation: 这位海军将领是位强袭专家。他指挥的桨帆船作战效率更高并能在海战中造成更多伤害。

original: Naval Gunner
translation: 海军炮手

original: This Admiral is known as a Naval Gunner. Constant drill of gunnery crews commanded by this leader means heavy ships will deal more damage.
translation: 这位海军将领被称作海军炮手。他麾下那些训练有素的炮手能使重型战舰造成更多伤害。

original: Accomplished Sailor
translation: 熟练的水手

original: This Admiral is an Accomplished Sailor. Personal sailing expertise allows this leader to enhance the skills of all captains under him, ships commanded by the Accomplished Sailor will reach their destinations more quickly.
translation: 这位海军将领是位熟练的水手。丰富的航海知识能提升他手下所有船长的能力，他指挥的船只能更快到达目的地。

original: Level-Headed
translation: 理智派

original: This Admiral is Level-Headed. By careful drill and a cool mind crews commanded by this leader will be more resilient to morale damage from received hits during naval combat.
translation: 这位海军将领很理智。凭借刻苦的训练和冷静的头脑，他指挥的船员在海战中受到攻击时会受到更少的士气损失。

original: Immortal
translation: 永生者

original: This ruler has found a way to cheat death and potentially live forever. While immune to disease and old age, they may still die from physical violence.
translation: 这位统治者设法欺骗了死神，很可能获得了永生。虽然免疫了疾病和衰老，他们仍会死于暴力伤害。

original: Obviously, reports of their immortality were greatly exaggerated.
translation: 很明显，关于他们永生的报道严重夸大其词。
